00027 // GENERAL CONSTRUCTOR
00028 
00066 
00067 MultilayerPerceptron::MultilayerPerceptron
00068 (int newNumberOfInputs, int newNumberOfHiddenNeurons, int newNumberOfOutputs)
00069 {
00070    // Set network architecture
00071   
00072    Vector<int> newNumbersOfHiddenNeurons(1, newNumberOfHiddenNeurons);
00073 
00074    setNetworkArchitecture(newNumberOfInputs, newNumbersOfHiddenNeurons, newNumberOfOutputs);
00075 
00076    // Initialize number of independent parameters to 0
00077 
00078    numberOfIndependentParameters = 0;
00079 
00080    // Pre and post processing method
00081 
00082    preAndPostProcessingMethod = None;
00083 
00084    // Numerical differentiation method
00085 
00086    numericalDifferentiationMethod = CentralDifferences;
00087 
00088    // Display out of range warning
00089    
00090    displayOutOfRangeWarning = false;
00091 
00092    // Display messages
00093    
00094    display = true;
00095 
00096    // Numerical epsilon
00097 
00098    numericalEpsilon = 1.0e-6;  
00099 }

00152 
00153 MultilayerPerceptron::MultilayerPerceptron(void)
00154 {
00155    // Network architecture
00156 
00157    numberOfInputs = 0;
00158 
00159    numberOfOutputs = 0;
00160 
00161    // Activation functions
00162 
00163    outputLayerActivationFunction = Perceptron::Linear;
00164 
00165    // Pre and post processing method
00166 
00167    preAndPostProcessingMethod = None;
00168 
00169    // Numerical differentiation method
00170 
00171    numericalDifferentiationMethod = CentralDifferences;
00172 
00173    // Initialize number of independent parameters to 0
00174 
00175    numberOfIndependentParameters = 0;
00176 
00177    // Display out of range warning
00178    
00179    displayOutOfRangeWarning = false;
00180 
00181    // Display messages
00182    
00183    display = true;
00184 
00185    // Numerical epsilon
00186 
00187    numericalEpsilon = 1.0e-6;   
00188 }

00348 // std::string getNameOfSingleInputVariable(int) method
00349 
00358 
00359 std::string MultilayerPerceptron::getNameOfSingleInputVariable(int i)
00360 {
00361    // Control sentence (if debug)
00362 
00363    #ifndef NDEBUG 
00364 
00365    if(i >= numberOfInputs)
00366    {
00367       std::cerr << std::endl
00368                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
00369                 << "std::string getNameOfSingleInputVariable(int) method." << std::endl
00370                 << "Index must and less than number of inputs."
00371                 << std::endl << std::endl;
00372 
00373       exit(1);
00374    }
00375 
00376    #endif
00377 
00378    return(nameOfInputVariables[i]);
00379 }

00612 // Vector< Vector<std::string> > getAllInformation(void) method
00613 
00614 Vector< Vector<std::string> > MultilayerPerceptron::getAllInformation(void)
00615 {
00616    Vector< Vector<std::string> > information(6);
00617  
00618    information[0] = nameOfInputVariables;
00619    information[1] = nameOfOutputVariables;
00620 
00621    information[2] = unitsOfInputVariables;
00622    information[3] = unitsOfOutputVariables;
00623 
00624    information[4] = descriptionOfInputVariables;
00625    information[5] = descriptionOfOutputVariables;
00626 
00627    return(information);
00628 }

00679 // Matrix<double> getMeanAndStandardDeviationOfInputVariables(void) method
00680 
00698 
00699 Matrix<double> MultilayerPerceptron::getMeanAndStandardDeviationOfInputVariables(void)
00700 {
00701    Matrix<double> meanAndStandardDeviationOfInputVariables(2, numberOfInputs);
00702 
00703    meanAndStandardDeviationOfInputVariables.setRow(0, meanOfInputVariables);
00704    meanAndStandardDeviationOfInputVariables.setRow(1, standardDeviationOfInputVariables);
00705 
00706    return(meanAndStandardDeviationOfInputVariables);
00707 }

00789 // double getMeanOfSingleInputVariable(int) method
00790 
00808 
00809 double MultilayerPerceptron::getMeanOfSingleInputVariable(int i)
00810 {
00811    // Control sentence (if debug)
00812 
00813    #ifndef NDEBUG 
00814 
00815    if(numberOfInputs == 0)
00816    {
00817       std::cerr << std::endl
00818                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl 
00819                 << "double getMeanOfSingleInputVariable(int) method." << std::endl
00820                 << "Number of inputs is zero." << std::endl 
00821                 << std::endl;
00822 
00823       exit(1);   
00824    }
00825    else if(i >= numberOfInputs)
00826    {
00827       std::cerr << std::endl
00828                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl 
00829                 << "double getMeanOfSingleInputVariable(int) method." << std::endl
00830                 << "Index must be less than number of inputs." << std::endl 
00831                 << std::endl;
00832 
00833       exit(1);
00834    }
00835 
00836    #endif
00837 
00838    return(meanOfInputVariables[i]);
00839 }

01160 // double getMinimumOfSingleInputVariable(int) method
01161 
01177 
01178 double MultilayerPerceptron::getMinimumOfSingleInputVariable(int i)
01179 {
01180    // Control sentence (if debug)
01181 
01182    #ifndef NDEBUG 
01183 
01184    if(numberOfInputs == 0)
01185    {
01186       std::cerr << std::endl
01187                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl 
01188                 << "double getMinimumOfSingleInputVariable(int) method." << std::endl
01189                 << "Number of inputs is zero." << std::endl 
01190                 << std::endl;
01191 
01192       exit(1);   
01193    }
01194    else if(i >= numberOfInputs)
01195    {
01196       std::cerr << std::endl
01197                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl 
01198                 << "double getMinimumOfSingleInputVariable(int) method." << std::endl
01199                 << "Index must be less than number of inputs." << std::endl 
01200                 << std::endl;
01201 
01202       exit(1);
01203    }
01204 
01205    #endif
01206 
01207    return(minimumOfInputVariables[i]);
01208 }

01289                 << "double getMinimumOfSingleOutputVariable(int) method." << std::endl
01290                 << "Number of outputs is zero." << std::endl 
01291                 << std::endl;
01292 
01293       exit(1);   
01294    }
01295    else if(i >= numberOfOutputs)
01296    {
01297       std::cerr << std::endl
01298                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl 
01299                 << "double getMinimumOfSingleOutputVariable(int) method." << std::endl
01300                 << "Index must be less than number of outputs." << std::endl 
01301                 << std::endl;
01302 
01303       exit(1);
01304    }
01305 
01306    #endif
01307 
01308    return(minimumOfOutputVariables[i]);
01309 }

01363 // Vector< Vector<double> > getAllStatistics(void) method
01364 
01365 Vector< Vector<double> > MultilayerPerceptron::getAllStatistics(void)
01366 {
01367    Vector< Vector<double> > statistics(8);
01368 
01369    statistics[0] = meanOfInputVariables;
01370    statistics[1] = standardDeviationOfInputVariables;
01371 
01372    statistics[2] = meanOfOutputVariables;
01373    statistics[3] = standardDeviationOfOutputVariables;
01374 
01375    statistics[4] = minimumOfInputVariables;
01376    statistics[5] = maximumOfInputVariables;
01377 
01378    statistics[6] = minimumOfOutputVariables;
01379    statistics[7] = maximumOfOutputVariables;
01380 
01381    return(statistics);
01382 }

02172 
02173 
02174 // Vector<double> scaleIndependentParameters(Vector<double>) method
02175 
02176 Vector<double> MultilayerPerceptron::scaleIndependentParameters(Vector<double> unscaledIndependentParameters)
02177 {
02178    Vector<double> scaledIndependentParameters(numberOfIndependentParameters);
02179 
02180    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfIndependentParameters; i++)
02181    {
02182       switch(preAndPostProcessingMethod)   
02183       {
02184          case None:
02185          {
02186             scaledIndependentParameters[i] = unscaledIndependentParameters[i];
02187          }
02188          break;
02189                                      
02190          case MeanAndStandardDeviation:
02191          {
02192             if(standardDeviationOfIndependentParameters[i] < 1.0e-9)
02193             {
02194                if(display)
02195                {
02196                   std::cout << std::endl
02197                             << "Flood Warning: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
02198                             << "Vector<double> scaleIndependentParameters(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
02199                             << "Standard deviation of independent parameter " << i << " is zero." << std::endl
02200                             << "That independent parameter won't be transformed." << std::endl; 
02201                }
02202 
02203                scaledIndependentParameters[i] = unscaledIndependentParameters[i];
02204             }
02205             else
02206             {
02207                scaledIndependentParameters[i] 
02208                = (unscaledIndependentParameters[i] - meanOfIndependentParameters[i])
02209                /standardDeviationOfIndependentParameters[i];
02210             }
02211          }
02212          break;
02213 
02214          case MinimumAndMaximum:
02215          {
02216             if(maximumOfIndependentParameters[i]-minimumOfIndependentParameters[i] < 1.0e-9)
02217             {
02218                if(display)
02219                {
02220                   std::cout << std::endl
02221                             << "Flood Warning: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
02222                             << "Vector<double> scaleIndependentParameters(Vector<double>) method." 
02223                             << std::endl
02224                             << "Maximum and minimum of independent parameter " << i << " are equal." << std::endl
02225                             << "That independent parameter won't be transformed." << std::endl; 
02226                }
02227 
02228                scaledIndependentParameters[i] = unscaledIndependentParameters[i];
02229             }
02230             else
02231             {
02232                scaledIndependentParameters[i] 
02233                = 2.0*(unscaledIndependentParameters[i] - minimumOfIndependentParameters[i])
02234                /(maximumOfIndependentParameters[i]-minimumOfIndependentParameters[i])-1.0;
02235             }
02236          }
02237          break;
02238 
02239       }// end switch
02240    }// end for
02241 
02242    return(scaledIndependentParameters);
02243 }
02244 
02245 
02246 // Vector<double> unscaleIndependentParameters(Vector<double>)
02247 
02248 Vector<double> MultilayerPerceptron::unscaleIndependentParameters(Vector<double> scaledIndependentParameters)
02249 {
02250    Vector<double> unscaledIndependentParameters(numberOfIndependentParameters);
02251 
02252    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfIndependentParameters; i++)
02253    {
02254       switch(preAndPostProcessingMethod)   
02255       {
02256          case None:
02257          {
02258             unscaledIndependentParameters[i] = scaledIndependentParameters[i]; 
02259          }
02260          break;
02261                                      
02262          case MeanAndStandardDeviation:
02263          {
02264             if(standardDeviationOfIndependentParameters[i] < 1e-9)
02265             {      
02266                if(display)
02267                {
02268                   std::cout << std::endl
02269                             << "Flood Warning: MultilayerPerceptron class" << std::endl
02270                             << "Vector<double> unscaleIndependentParameters(Vector<double>) method." 
02271                             << std::endl               
02272                             << "Standard deviation of independent parameter " << i << " is zero." << std::endl 
02273                             << "That independent parameter won't be transformed." << std::endl;
02274                }
02275                
02276                unscaledIndependentParameters[i] = scaledIndependentParameters[i];
02277             }      
02278             else
02279             {
02280                unscaledIndependentParameters[i] 
02281                = scaledIndependentParameters[i]*standardDeviationOfIndependentParameters[i] 
02282                + meanOfIndependentParameters[i];
02283             }
02284   
02285           }
02286           break;
02287 
02288          case MinimumAndMaximum:
02289          {
02290             if(maximumOfIndependentParameters[i]-minimumOfIndependentParameters[i] < 1e-9)
02291             {      
02292                if(display)
02293                {
02294                   std::cout << std::endl
02295                             << "Flood Warning: MultilayerPerceptron class" << std::endl
02296                             << "Vector<double> unscaleIndependentParameters(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl               
02297                             << "Maximum and minimum of independent parameter " << i << " are equal." << std::endl
02298                             << "That independent parameter won't be transformed." << std::endl; 
02299                }
02300                
02301                unscaledIndependentParameters[i] = scaledIndependentParameters[i];
02302             }      
02303             else
02304             {
02305                unscaledIndependentParameters[i] = 0.5*(scaledIndependentParameters[i] + 1.0)
02306                *(maximumOfIndependentParameters[i]-minimumOfIndependentParameters[i]) 
02307                + minimumOfIndependentParameters[i]; 
02308             }
02309           }
02310           break;
02311 
02312      }// end switch       
02313    }// end for
02314 
02315    return(unscaledIndependentParameters);
02316 }
02317 
02318 
02319 // Vector<double> getIndependentParameters(void) method
02320 
02326 
02327 Vector<double> MultilayerPerceptron::getIndependentParameters(void)
02328 {   
02329    // Apply lower and upper bounds
02330 
02331    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfIndependentParameters; i++)
02332    {
02333       if(independentParameters[i] < lowerBoundOfIndependentParameters[i])
02334      {
02335         independentParameters[i] = lowerBoundOfIndependentParameters[i];
02336      }
02337       else if(independentParameters[i] > upperBoundOfIndependentParameters[i])
02338      {
02339         independentParameters[i] = upperBoundOfIndependentParameters[i];
02340      }
02341    }
02342 
02343    return(independentParameters);    
02344 }
02345 
02346 
02347 // double getSingleIndependentParameter(int) method
02348 
02356 
02357 double MultilayerPerceptron::getSingleIndependentParameter(int i)
02358 {
02359    // Control sentence (if debug)
02360 
02361    #ifndef NDEBUG 
02362 
02363    if(numberOfIndependentParameters == 0)
02364    {
02365       std::cerr << std::endl
02366                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl 
02367                 << "double getSingleIndependentParameter(int) method." << std::endl
02368                 << "Number of independent parameters is zero." << std::endl 
02369             << std::endl;
02370 
02371       exit(1);
02372    
02373    }
02374    else if(i >= numberOfIndependentParameters)
02375    {
02376       std::cerr << std::endl
02377                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl 
02378                 << "double getSingleIndependentParameter(int) method." << std::endl
02379                 << "Index must be less than number of independent parameters." << std::endl 
02380                 << std::endl;
02381 
02382       exit(1);
02383    }
02384 
02385    #endif
02386 
02387    if(independentParameters[i] < lowerBoundOfIndependentParameters[i])
02388    {
02389       independentParameters[i] = lowerBoundOfIndependentParameters[i];
02390    }
02391    else if(independentParameters[i] > upperBoundOfIndependentParameters[i])
02392    {
02393       independentParameters[i] = upperBoundOfIndependentParameters[i];
02394    }
02395 
02396    return(independentParameters[i]);           
02397 }

02462 
02463 // void setNetworkArchitecture(int, int, int) method
02464 
02493 
02494 void MultilayerPerceptron::setNetworkArchitecture
02495 (int newNumberOfInputs, Vector<int> newNumbersOfHiddenNeurons, int newNumberOfOutputs)
02496 {
02497    // Set new architecture      
02498    
02499    numberOfInputs = newNumberOfInputs;
02500    numbersOfHiddenNeurons = newNumbersOfHiddenNeurons;
02501    numberOfOutputs = newNumberOfOutputs;
02502 
02503    int numberOfHiddenLayers = getNumberOfHiddenLayers();
02504 
02505    // Set activation functions
02506 
02507    hiddenLayersActivationFunction.setSize(numberOfHiddenLayers);
02508 
02509    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfHiddenLayers; i++)
02510    {
02511       hiddenLayersActivationFunction[i] = Perceptron::HyperbolicTangent;
02512    }
02513 
02514    outputLayerActivationFunction = Perceptron::Linear;
02515 
02516    // Hidden layer
02517 
02518    hiddenLayers.setSize(numberOfHiddenLayers);
02519 
02520    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfHiddenLayers; i++)
02521    {
02522       hiddenLayers[i].setSize(numbersOfHiddenNeurons[i]);
02523 
02524       for(int j = 0; j < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[i]; j++)
02525       {
02526          hiddenLayers[i][j].setActivationFunction(hiddenLayersActivationFunction[i]);
02527 
02528          if(i == 0)// First hidden layer
02529          {
02530             hiddenLayers[i][j].setNumberOfInputs(numberOfInputs);
02531          }
02532          else
02533          {
02534             hiddenLayers[i][j].setNumberOfInputs(numbersOfHiddenNeurons[i-1]);
02535          }       
02536       }
02537    }
02538 
02539    // Output layer
02540 
02541    outputLayer.setSize(numberOfOutputs);
02542 
02543    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfOutputs; i++)
02544    {
02545       outputLayer[i].setActivationFunction(Perceptron::Linear);
02546 
02547       outputLayer[i].setNumberOfInputs(numbersOfHiddenNeurons[numberOfHiddenLayers-1]);
02548    }
02549 
02550    // Name of input variables
02551 
02552    nameOfInputVariables.setSize(numberOfInputs);
02553 
02554    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfInputs; i++)
02555    {
02556       std::stringstream buffer;
02557 
02558       buffer << "InputVariable" << i;
02559 
02560       nameOfInputVariables[i] = buffer.str();
02561    }
02562 
02563    // Name of output variables
02564 
02565    nameOfOutputVariables.setSize(numberOfOutputs);
02566 
02567    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfOutputs; i++)
02568    {
02569       std::stringstream buffer;
02570 
02571       buffer << "OutputVariable" << i;
02572 
02573       nameOfOutputVariables[i] = buffer.str();
02574    }
02575 
02576    // Units of input variables
02577 
02578    unitsOfInputVariables.setSize(numberOfInputs);
02579 
02580    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfInputs; i++)
02581    {
02582       unitsOfInputVariables[i] = "None";
02583    }
02584 
02585    // Units of output variables
02586 
02587    unitsOfOutputVariables.setSize(numberOfOutputs);
02588 
02589    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfOutputs; i++)
02590    {
02591       unitsOfOutputVariables[i] = "None";
02592    }
02593 
02594    // Description of input variables
02595 
02596    descriptionOfInputVariables.setSize(numberOfInputs);
02597 
02598    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfInputs; i++)
02599    {
02600       descriptionOfInputVariables[i] = "None";
02601    }
02602 
02603    // Description of output variables
02604 
02605    descriptionOfOutputVariables.setSize(numberOfOutputs);
02606 
02607    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfOutputs; i++)
02608    {
02609       descriptionOfOutputVariables[i] = "None";
02610    }
02611 
02612    // Initialize mean of input variables to zero
02613 
02614    meanOfInputVariables.setSize(numberOfInputs);    
02615 
02616    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfInputs; i++)
02617    {
02618       meanOfInputVariables[i] = 0.0;
02619    }
02620 
02621    // Initialize standard deviation of input variables to one
02622 
02623    standardDeviationOfInputVariables.setSize(numberOfInputs);    
02624 
02625    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfInputs; i++)
02626    {
02627       standardDeviationOfInputVariables[i] = 1.0;
02628    }
02629 
02630    // Initialize mean of output variables to zero
02631 
02632    meanOfOutputVariables.setSize(numberOfOutputs);    
02633 
02634    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfOutputs; i++)
02635    {
02636       meanOfOutputVariables[i] = 0.0;
02637    }
02638 
02639    // Initialize Standard deviation of output variables to one
02640 
02641    standardDeviationOfOutputVariables.setSize(numberOfOutputs);    
02642 
02643    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfOutputs; i++)
02644    {
02645       standardDeviationOfOutputVariables[i] = 1.0;
02646    }
02647 
02648    // Initialize minimum of input variables to -1
02649 
02650    minimumOfInputVariables.setSize(numberOfInputs);    
02651 
02652    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfInputs; i++)
02653    {
02654       minimumOfInputVariables[i] = -1.0;
02655    }
02656 
02657    // Initialize maximum of input variables to +1
02658 
02659    maximumOfInputVariables.setSize(numberOfInputs);    
02660 
02661    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfInputs; i++)
02662    {
02663       maximumOfInputVariables[i] = 1.0;
02664    }
02665 
02666    // Initialize minimum of output variables to -1
02667 
02668    minimumOfOutputVariables.setSize(numberOfOutputs);    
02669 
02670    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfOutputs; i++)
02671    {
02672       minimumOfOutputVariables[i] = -1.0;
02673    }
02674 
02675    // Initialize maximum of output variables to 1
02676 
02677    maximumOfOutputVariables.setSize(numberOfOutputs);    
02678 
02679    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfOutputs; i++)
02680    {
02681       maximumOfOutputVariables[i] = 1.0;
02682    }
02683 
02684    // Initialize lower bound of output variables to -Inf
02685 
02686    lowerBoundOfOutputVariables.setSize(numberOfOutputs);    
02687 
02688    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfOutputs; i++)
02689    {
02690       lowerBoundOfOutputVariables[i] = -1.0e99;
02691    }
02692 
02693    // Initialize upper bound of output variables to Inf
02694 
02695    upperBoundOfOutputVariables.setSize(numberOfOutputs);    
02696 
02697    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfOutputs; i++)
02698    {
02699       upperBoundOfOutputVariables[i] = 1.0e99;
02700    }
02701 
02702 }
02703 
02704 
02705 void MultilayerPerceptron::setNumbersOfHiddenNeurons(Vector<int> newNumbersOfHiddenNeurons)
02706 {
02707    // Set new architecture      
02708 
02709    numbersOfHiddenNeurons = newNumbersOfHiddenNeurons;
02710 
02711    int numberOfHiddenLayers = numbersOfHiddenNeurons.getSize();
02712 
02713    // Activation functions
02714 
02715    hiddenLayersActivationFunction.setSize(numberOfHiddenLayers);
02716 
02717    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfHiddenLayers; i++)
02718    {
02719       hiddenLayersActivationFunction[i] = Perceptron::HyperbolicTangent;
02720    }
02721 
02722    hiddenLayers.setSize(numberOfHiddenLayers);
02723 
02724    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfHiddenLayers; i++)
02725    {
02726       hiddenLayers[i].setSize(numbersOfHiddenNeurons[i]);
02727 
02728       for(int j = 0; j < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[i]; j++)
02729       {
02730          hiddenLayers[i][j].setActivationFunction(hiddenLayersActivationFunction[i]);
02731 
02732          if(i == 0)// First hidden layer
02733          {
02734             hiddenLayers[i][j].setNumberOfInputs(numberOfInputs);
02735          }
02736          else
02737          {
02738             hiddenLayers[i][j].setNumberOfInputs(numbersOfHiddenNeurons[i-1]);
02739          }       
02740       }
02741    }
02742 
02743    // Output layer
02744 
02745    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfOutputs; i++)
02746    {
02747       outputLayer[i].setActivationFunction(outputLayerActivationFunction);     
02748 
02749       outputLayer[i].setNumberOfInputs(numbersOfHiddenNeurons[numberOfHiddenLayers-1]);
02750    }
02751 }
02752 
02753 
02754 // void setHiddenLayerActivationFunction(Perceptron::ActivationFunction) method
02755 
02764 
02765 void MultilayerPerceptron::setHiddenLayersActivationFunction(Vector<Perceptron::ActivationFunction> 
02766 newHiddenLayersActivationFunction)
02767 {
02768    hiddenLayersActivationFunction = newHiddenLayersActivationFunction;
02769 
02770    int numberOfHiddenLayers = numbersOfHiddenNeurons.getSize();
02771 
02772    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfHiddenLayers; i++)
02773    {
02774       for(int j = 0; j < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[i]; j++)
02775       {
02776          hiddenLayers[i][j].setActivationFunction(hiddenLayersActivationFunction[i]);
02777       }
02778    }
02779 }
02780 
02781 
02782 // void setOutputLayerActivationFunction(Perceptron::ActivationFunction) method
02783 
02790 
02791 void MultilayerPerceptron::setOutputLayerActivationFunction(Perceptron::ActivationFunction 
02792 newOutputLayerActivationFunction)
02793 {
02794    outputLayerActivationFunction = newOutputLayerActivationFunction;
02795 
02796    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfOutputs; i++)
02797    {
02798       outputLayer[i].setActivationFunction(outputLayerActivationFunction);
02799    }
02800 }

03206 
03207 // void setDescriptionOfSingleOutputVariable(int, std::string) method
03208 
03218 
03219 void MultilayerPerceptron::setDescriptionOfSingleOutputVariable(int i, 
03220 std::string newDescriptionOfSingleOutputVariable)
03221 {
03222    // Control sentence (if debug)
03223 
03224    #ifndef NDEBUG 
03225 
03226    if(i >= numberOfOutputs)
03227    {
03228       std::cerr << std::endl
03229                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
03230                 << "void setDescriptionOfSingleOutputVariable(int, std::string) method." << std::endl 
03231                 << "Index must be less than number of outputs." << std::endl
03232                 << std::endl;
03233 
03234       exit(1);   
03235    }
03236 
03237    #endif
03238 
03239    // Set description of single output variable
03240 
03241    descriptionOfOutputVariables[i] = newDescriptionOfSingleOutputVariable;
03242 }
03243

03247 void MultilayerPerceptron::setAllInformation(Vector< Vector<std::string> > newInformation)
03248 {

03250 
03251    #ifndef NDEBUG 
03252

03254

03256    {
03257       std::cerr << std::endl
03258                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
03259                 << "void setAllInformation(Vector< Vector<std::string> >) method." << std::endl 
03260                 << "Size of vector must be 6." << std::endl
03261                 << std::endl;
03262 
03263       exit(1);   
03264    }
03265 
03266    #endif
03267 
03268    // Set all information
03269 
03270    setNameOfInputVariables(newInformation[0]);
03271    setNameOfOutputVariables(newInformation[1]);
03272 
03273    setUnitsOfInputVariables(newInformation[2]);
03274    setUnitsOfOutputVariables(newInformation[3]);
03275 
03276    setDescriptionOfInputVariables(newInformation[4]);
03277    setDescriptionOfOutputVariables(newInformation[5]);
03278 }

03359 // void setMeanAndStandardDeviationOfInputVariables(Matrix<double>) method
03360 
03375 
03376 void MultilayerPerceptron::setMeanAndStandardDeviationOfInputVariables
03377 (Matrix<double> newMeanAndStandardDeviationOfInputVariables)
03378 {
03379    // Control sentence (if debug)
03380 
03381    #ifndef NDEBUG 
03382 
03383    if(newMeanAndStandardDeviationOfInputVariables.getNumberOfRows() != 2)
03384    {
03385       std::cerr << std::endl
03386                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
03387                 << "void setMeanAndStandardDeviationOfInputVariables(Matrix<double>) method." << std::endl
03388                 << "Number of rows must be 2." << std::endl
03389                 << std::endl;
03390 
03391       exit(1);
03392    }
03393    else if(newMeanAndStandardDeviationOfInputVariables.getNumberOfColumns() != numberOfInputs)
03394    {
03395       std::cerr << std::endl
03396                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
03397                 << "void setMeanAndStandardDeviationOfInputVariables(Matrix<double>) method." << std::endl
03398                 << "Number of columns must be equal to number of inputs." << std::endl
03399                 << std::endl;
03400 
03401       exit(1);
03402    }
03403 
03404    // Check that mean of input variables is not zero
03405 
03406    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfInputs; i++)
03407    {
03408       if(newMeanAndStandardDeviationOfInputVariables[1][i] < 1.0e-69)
03409       {
03410          std::cerr << std::endl
03411                    << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class: " << std::endl
03412                    << "void setMeanAndStandardDeviationOfInputVariables(Matrix<double>) method." << std::endl
03413                    << "Standard deviation of input variable "<< i << " is zero." << std::endl
03414                    << std::endl;
03415 
03416           exit(1);
03417       }
03418    }
03419 
03420    #endif
03421 
03422    // Set mean and standard deviation of input variables
03423 
03424    meanOfInputVariables = newMeanAndStandardDeviationOfInputVariables.getRow(0);
03425 
03426    standardDeviationOfInputVariables = newMeanAndStandardDeviationOfInputVariables.getRow(1);
03427 }

03871 // void setMinimumAndMaximumOfInputVariables(Matrix<double>) method
03872 
03886 
03887 void MultilayerPerceptron
03888 ::setMinimumAndMaximumOfInputVariables(Matrix<double> newMinimumAndMaximumOfInputVariables)
03889 {
03890    // Control sentence (if debug)
03891 
03892    #ifndef NDEBUG 
03893 
03894    if(newMinimumAndMaximumOfInputVariables.getNumberOfRows() != 2)
03895    {
03896       std::cerr << std::endl
03897                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl 
03898                 << "void setMinimumAndMaximumOfInputVariables(Matrix<double>) method." << std::endl
03899                 << "Number of rows must be 2." << std::endl
03900                 << std::endl;
03901 
03902       exit(1);
03903    }
03904    else if(newMinimumAndMaximumOfInputVariables.getNumberOfColumns() != numberOfInputs)
03905    {
03906       std::cerr << std::endl
03907                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl 
03908                 << "void setMinimumAndMaximumOfInputVariables(Matrix<double>) method." << std::endl
03909                 << "Number of columns must be equal to number of inputs." << std::endl
03910                 << std::endl;
03911 
03912       exit(1);
03913    }
03914 
03915    // Check that minimum of input variables is not greater than their maximum
03916 
03917    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfInputs; i++)
03918    {
03919       if(newMinimumAndMaximumOfInputVariables[0][i] >= newMinimumAndMaximumOfInputVariables[1][i])
03920       {
03921          std::cerr << std::endl
03922                    << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
03923                    << "void setMinimumAndMaximumOfInputVariables(Matrix<double>) method." << std::endl
03924                    << "Minimum of input variable " << i << " is equal or greater than maximum of that variable."
03925                    << std::endl << std::endl;
03926 
03927          exit(1);
03928       }
03929    }
03930 
03931    #endif
03932 
03933    // Set minimum and maximum of input variables
03934 
03935    minimumOfInputVariables = newMinimumAndMaximumOfInputVariables.getRow(0);
03936 
03937    maximumOfInputVariables = newMinimumAndMaximumOfInputVariables.getRow(1);
03938 }
03939

03967                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl 
03968                 << "void setMinimumAndMaximumOfOutputVariables(Matrix<double>) method." << std::endl
03969                 << "Number of rows must be 2."  << std::endl
03970                 << std::endl;
03971 
03972       exit(1);
03973    }
03974    else if(newMinimumAndMaximumOfOutputVariables.getNumberOfColumns() != numberOfOutputs)
03975    {
03976       std::cerr << std::endl
03977                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl 
03978                 << "void setMinimumAndMaximumOfOutputVariables(Matrix<double>) method." << std::endl
03979                 << "Number of columns must be equal to number of outputs." << std::endl
03980                 << std::endl;
03981 
03982       exit(1);
03983    }
03984

03986

03988    {

03990       {

03992                    << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl

03995                    << std::endl << std::endl;
03996 
03997          exit(1);
03998       }
03999    }
04000 
04001    #endif
04002 
04003    // Set minimum and maximum of output variables
04004 
04005    minimumOfOutputVariables = newMinimumAndMaximumOfOutputVariables.getRow(0);
04006 
04007    maximumOfOutputVariables = newMinimumAndMaximumOfOutputVariables.getRow(1);
04008 }

04166 
04167 // void setAllStatistics(Vector< Vector<double> >) method
04168 
04169 void MultilayerPerceptron::setAllStatistics(Vector< Vector<double> > newStatistics)
04170 {
04171    // Control sentence (if debug)
04172 
04173    #ifndef NDEBUG 
04174 
04175    int size = newStatistics.getSize();
04176 
04177    if(size != 8)
04178    {
04179       std::cerr << std::endl
04180                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
04181                 << "void setAllStatistics(Vector< Vector<double> >) method." << std::endl
04182                 << "Size must be 8." << std::endl
04183                 << std::endl;
04184 
04185       exit(1);
04186    }
04187 
04188    #endif
04189 
04190    // Set all statistics
04191  
04192    setMeanOfInputVariables(newStatistics[0]);
04193    setStandardDeviationOfInputVariables(newStatistics[1]);
04194 
04195    setMeanOfOutputVariables(newStatistics[2]);
04196    setStandardDeviationOfOutputVariables(newStatistics[3]);
04197 
04198    setMinimumOfInputVariables(newStatistics[4]);
04199    setMaximumOfInputVariables(newStatistics[5]);
04200 
04201    setMinimumOfOutputVariables(newStatistics[6]);
04202    setMaximumOfOutputVariables(newStatistics[7]);
04203 }
04204

04280 // void setLowerAndUpperBoundsOfOutputVariables(Matrix<double>) method

04295 
04296 void MultilayerPerceptron
04297 ::setLowerAndUpperBoundsOfOutputVariables(Matrix<double> newLowerAndUpperBoundsOfOutputVariables)
04298 {
04299    // Control sentence (if debug)
04300 
04301    #ifndef NDEBUG 
04302 
04303    int numberOfRows = newLowerAndUpperBoundsOfOutputVariables.getNumberOfRows();
04304    int numberOfColumns = newLowerAndUpperBoundsOfOutputVariables.getNumberOfColumns();
04305 
04306    if(numberOfRows != 2)
04307    {
04308       std::cerr << std::endl
04309                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
04310                 << "void setLowerAndUpperBoundsOfOutputVariables(Matrix<double>) method." << std::endl
04311                 << "Number of rows must be 2." << std::endl
04312                 << std::endl;
04313 
04314       exit(1);
04315    }
04316    else if(numberOfColumns != numberOfOutputs)
04317    {
04318       std::cerr << std::endl
04319                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
04320                 << "void setLowerAndUpperBoundsOfOutputVariables(Matrix<double>) method." << std::endl
04321                 << "Number of columns must be equal to number of outputs." << std::endl
04322                 << std::endl;
04323 
04324       exit(1);
04325    }
04326 
04327    #endif
04328 
04329    // Set lower and upper bounds of output variables
04330 
04331    lowerBoundOfOutputVariables = newLowerAndUpperBoundsOfOutputVariables.getRow(0);
04332    upperBoundOfOutputVariables = newLowerAndUpperBoundsOfOutputVariables.getRow(1);
04333 }

04413 
04414 // void setNumberOfIndependentParameters(int) method
04415 
04432 
04433 void MultilayerPerceptron::setNumberOfIndependentParameters(int newNumberOfIndependentParameters)
04434 {
04435    numberOfIndependentParameters = newNumberOfIndependentParameters;
04436 
04437    // Independent parameters
04438 
04439    independentParameters.setSize(numberOfIndependentParameters);
04440 
04441    // Name of independent parameters
04442 
04443    nameOfIndependentParameters.setSize(numberOfIndependentParameters);
04444 
04445    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfIndependentParameters; i++)
04446    {
04447       std::stringstream buffer;
04448 
04449       buffer << "IndependentParameter" << i;
04450 
04451       nameOfIndependentParameters[i] = buffer.str();
04452    }
04453 
04454    // Units of independent parameters
04455 
04456    unitsOfIndependentParameters.setSize(numberOfIndependentParameters);
04457 
04458    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfIndependentParameters; i++)
04459    {
04460       unitsOfIndependentParameters[i] = "None";
04461    }
04462 
04463    // Description of independent parameters
04464 
04465    descriptionOfIndependentParameters.setSize(numberOfIndependentParameters);
04466 
04467    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfIndependentParameters; i++)
04468    {
04469       descriptionOfIndependentParameters[i] = "None";
04470    }
04471 
04472    // Mean of independent parameters
04473 
04474    meanOfIndependentParameters.setSize(numberOfIndependentParameters);
04475 
04476    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfIndependentParameters; i++)
04477    {
04478       meanOfIndependentParameters[i] = 0.0;
04479    }
04480       
04481    // Standard deviation of independent parameters
04482 
04483    standardDeviationOfIndependentParameters.setSize(numberOfIndependentParameters);
04484 
04485    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfIndependentParameters; i++)
04486    {
04487       standardDeviationOfIndependentParameters[i] = 1.0;
04488    }
04489 
04490    // Minimum of independent parameters
04491 
04492    minimumOfIndependentParameters.setSize(numberOfIndependentParameters);
04493 
04494    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfIndependentParameters; i++)
04495    {
04496       minimumOfIndependentParameters[i] = -1.0e-99;
04497    }
04498       
04499    // Maximum of independent parameters
04500 
04501    maximumOfIndependentParameters.setSize(numberOfIndependentParameters);
04502 
04503    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfIndependentParameters; i++)
04504    {
04505       maximumOfIndependentParameters[i] = 1.0e99;
04506    }
04507 
04508    // Lower bound of independent parameters
04509 
04510    lowerBoundOfIndependentParameters.setSize(numberOfIndependentParameters);
04511 
04512    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfIndependentParameters; i++)
04513    {
04514       lowerBoundOfIndependentParameters[i] = -1.0e99;
04515    }
04516       
04517    // Upper bound of independent parameters
04518 
04519    upperBoundOfIndependentParameters.setSize(numberOfIndependentParameters);
04520 
04521    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfIndependentParameters; i++)
04522    {
04523       upperBoundOfIndependentParameters[i] = 1.0e99;
04524    }
04525 
04526    // Initialize independent parameters 
04527   
04528    initIndependentParametersNormal(0.0,1.0);
04529 }
04530

04889 // void setMeanAndStandardDeviationOfIndependentParameters(Matrix<double>) method
04890 
04903 
04904 void MultilayerPerceptron::setMeanAndStandardDeviationOfIndependentParameters
04905 (Matrix<double> newMeanAndStandardDeviationOfIndependentParameters)
04906 {
04907    // Control sentence (if debug)
04908 
04909    #ifndef NDEBUG 
04910 
04911    int numberOfRows = newMeanAndStandardDeviationOfIndependentParameters.getNumberOfRows();
04912    int numberOfColumns = newMeanAndStandardDeviationOfIndependentParameters.getNumberOfRows();
04913 
04914    if(numberOfRows != 2)
04915    {
04916       std::cerr << std::endl
04917                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
04918                 << "void setMeanAndStandardDeviationOfIndependentParameters(Matrix<double>) method." << std::endl
04919                 << "Number of rows must be 2." << std::endl 
04920                 << std::endl;
04921 
04922       exit(1);
04923    }
04924    else if(numberOfColumns != numberOfIndependentParameters)
04925    {
04926       std::cerr << std::endl
04927                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
04928                 << "void setMeanAndStandardDeviationOfIndependentParameters(Matrix<double>) method." << std::endl
04929                 << "Number of columns must be equal to number of independent parameters." << std::endl
04930                 << std::endl;
04931 
04932       exit(1);
04933    }
04934 
04935    // Check that standard deviation of input variables is not zero
04936 
04937    if(display)
04938    {
04939       for(int i = 0; i < numberOfInputs; i++)
04940       {
04941          if(newMeanAndStandardDeviationOfIndependentParameters[1][i] < 1.0e-69)
04942          {
04943             std::cerr << std::endl
04944                       << "Flood Warning: MultilayerPerceptron class: " << std::endl
04945                       << "void setMeanAndStandardDeviationOfIndependentParameters(Matrix<double>) method."
04946                       << std::endl
04947                       << "Standard deviation of independent parameter " << i << " is zero." << std::endl 
04948                       << std::endl;
04949          }
04950       }
04951    }
04952 
04953    #endif
04954 
04955    // Set mean and standard deviation of independent parameters
04956 
04957    meanOfIndependentParameters = newMeanAndStandardDeviationOfIndependentParameters.getRow(0);
04958    standardDeviationOfIndependentParameters = newMeanAndStandardDeviationOfIndependentParameters.getRow(1);
04959 }

05118 
05119 // void setMinimumAndMaximumOfIndependentParameters(Matrix<double>) method
05120 
05134 
05135 void MultilayerPerceptron
05136 ::setMinimumAndMaximumOfIndependentParameters(Matrix<double> newMinimumAndMaximumOfIndependentParameters)
05137 {
05138    // Control sentence (if debug)
05139 
05140    #ifndef NDEBUG 
05141 
05142    if(newMinimumAndMaximumOfIndependentParameters.getNumberOfRows() != 2)
05143    {
05144       std::cerr << std::endl
05145                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl 
05146                 << "void setMinimumAndMaximumOfIndependentParameters(Matrix<double>) method." << std::endl
05147                 << "Number of rows must be 2." << std::endl 
05148                 << std::endl;
05149 
05150       exit(1);
05151    }
05152    else if(newMinimumAndMaximumOfIndependentParameters.getNumberOfColumns() != numberOfIndependentParameters)
05153    {
05154       std::cerr << std::endl
05155                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl 
05156                 << "void setMinimumAndMaximumOfIndependentParameters(Matrix<double>) method." << std::endl
05157                 << "Number of columns must be equal to number of independent parameters." << std::endl
05158                 << std::endl;
05159 
05160       exit(1);
05161    }
05162 
05163    // Check that minimum of independent parameters is not greater than their maximum
05164 
05165    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfIndependentParameters; i++)
05166    {
05167       if(newMinimumAndMaximumOfIndependentParameters[0][i] >= newMinimumAndMaximumOfIndependentParameters[1][i])
05168       {
05169          std::cerr << std::endl
05170                    << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
05171                    << "void setMinimumAndMaximumOfIndependentParameters(Matrix<double>) method." << std::endl
05172                    << "Minimum of independent parameter "<< i 
05173                                    << " is equal or greater than maximum of that parameter."
05174                    << std::endl << std::endl;
05175 
05176          exit(1);
05177       }
05178    }
05179 
05180    #endif
05181 
05182    // Set minimum and maximum of independent parameters
05183 
05184    minimumOfIndependentParameters = newMinimumAndMaximumOfIndependentParameters.getRow(0);
05185    maximumOfIndependentParameters = newMinimumAndMaximumOfIndependentParameters.getRow(1);
05186 }
05187 
05188

05204 double newMinimumOfSingleIndependentParameter)
05205 {
05206    // Control sentence (if debug)

05209 
05210    if(i >= numberOfIndependentParameters)
05211    {
05212       std::cerr << std::endl
05213                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
05214                 << "void setMinimumOfSingleIndependentParameter(int, double) method." << std::endl
05215                 << "Index must be less than number of independent parameters." << std::endl 
05216                 << std::endl;
05217 
05218       exit(1);   
05219    }
05220 
05221    #endif

05224

05380                 << std::endl;

05385    {

05387                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl 
05388                 << "void setLowerAndUpperBoundsOfIndependentParameters(Matrix<double>) method." << std::endl
05389                 << "Number of columns must be equal to number of independent parameters." << std::endl
05390                 << std::endl;
05391 
05392       exit(1);
05393    }
05394 
05395    #endif
05396 
05397    // Set lower and upper bounds of independent parameters
05398 
05399    lowerBoundOfIndependentParameters = newLowerAndUpperBoundsOfIndependentParameters.getRow(0);
05400    upperBoundOfIndependentParameters = newLowerAndUpperBoundsOfIndependentParameters.getRow(1);

05544 
05545 
05546 int MultilayerPerceptron::getNumberOfHiddenLayers(void)
05547 {
05548    int numberOfHiddenLayers = numbersOfHiddenNeurons.getSize();
05549 
05550    return(numberOfHiddenLayers);
05551 }
05552 
05553 
05554 // int getNumberOfNeuralParameters(void) method
05555 
05560 
05561 int MultilayerPerceptron::getNumberOfNeuralParameters(void)
05562 {
05563    int numberOfHiddenLayers = getNumberOfHiddenLayers();
05564 
05565    int numberOfNeuralParameters = 0;
05566 
05567    // Hidden layers parameters
05568 
05569    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfHiddenLayers; i++)
05570    {
05571       for(int j = 0; j < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[i]; j++)
05572       {
05573          numberOfNeuralParameters += hiddenLayers[i][j].getNumberOfNeuronParameters();
05574       }
05575    }
05576 
05577    // Output layer parameters
05578 
05579    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfOutputs; i++)
05580    {
05581       numberOfNeuralParameters += outputLayer[i].getNumberOfNeuronParameters();
05582    }
05583 
05584    return(numberOfNeuralParameters);
05585 }
05586 
05587 
05588 // int getNumberOfFreeParameters(void) method
05589 
05595 
05596 int MultilayerPerceptron::getNumberOfFreeParameters(void)
05597 {
05598    int numberOfFreeParameters = 0;
05599   
05600    int numberOfNeuralParameters = getNumberOfNeuralParameters();
05601 
05602    numberOfFreeParameters = numberOfNeuralParameters + numberOfIndependentParameters;
05603 
05604    return(numberOfFreeParameters);
05605 }
05606 
05607 
05608 // Vector<double> getNeuralParameters(void) method
05609 
05615 
05616 Vector<double> MultilayerPerceptron::getNeuralParameters(void)
05617 {
05618    int numberOfHiddenLayers = getNumberOfHiddenLayers();
05619 
05620    int numberOfNeuralParameters = getNumberOfNeuralParameters();
05621    int numberOfHiddenNeuronParameters;
05622    int numberOfOutputNeuronParameters;
05623 
05624    Vector<double> neuralParameters(numberOfNeuralParameters, 0.0);
05625    Vector<double> hiddenNeuronParameters;
05626    Vector<double> outputNeuronParameters;
05627 
05628    // Hidden layers parameters
05629 
05630    int position = 0;
05631 
05632    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfHiddenLayers; i++)
05633    {
05634       for(int j = 0; j < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[i]; j++)
05635       {
05636          hiddenNeuronParameters = hiddenLayers[i][j].getNeuronParameters();
05637          numberOfHiddenNeuronParameters = hiddenLayers[i][j].getNumberOfNeuronParameters();
05638 
05639          neuralParameters.insert(position, hiddenNeuronParameters);
05640          position += numberOfHiddenNeuronParameters; 
05641       }
05642    }
05643 
05644    // Output layer parameters
05645 
05646    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfOutputs; i++)
05647    {
05648       outputNeuronParameters = outputLayer[i].getNeuronParameters();
05649       numberOfOutputNeuronParameters = outputLayer[i].getNumberOfNeuronParameters();
05650 
05651       neuralParameters.insert(position, outputNeuronParameters);       
05652       position += numberOfOutputNeuronParameters; 
05653    }
05654 
05655    return(neuralParameters);
05656 }
05657 
05658 
05659 // Vector<double> getFreeParameters(void) method
05660 
05663 
05664 Vector<double> MultilayerPerceptron::getFreeParameters(void)
05665 {
05666    Vector<double> neuralParameters = getNeuralParameters();
05667 
05668    Vector<double> independentParameters = getIndependentParameters();
05669 
05670    Vector<double> scaledIndependentParameters = scaleIndependentParameters(independentParameters);
05671 
05672    Vector<double> freeParameters = neuralParameters.assemble(scaledIndependentParameters);
05673 
05674    return(freeParameters);
05675 }
05676 
05677 
05678 // void setNeuralParameters(Vector<double>) method
05679 
05683 
05684 void MultilayerPerceptron::setNeuralParameters(Vector<double> newNeuralParameters)
05685 {
05686    // Control sentence (if debug)
05687 
05688    #ifndef NDEBUG 
05689 
05690    int size = newNeuralParameters.getSize();
05691 
05692    int numberOfNeuralParameters = getNumberOfNeuralParameters();
05693 
05694    if(size != numberOfNeuralParameters)
05695    {
05696       std::cerr << std::endl
05697                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
05698                 << "void setNeuralParameters(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
05699                 << "Size must be equal to number of biases and synaptic weights." << std::endl
05700                 << std::endl;
05701 
05702       exit(1);
05703    }
05704 
05705    #endif
05706 
05707    int numberOfHiddenLayers = getNumberOfHiddenLayers();
05708 
05709    // Hidden layers parameters
05710 
05711    int index = 0;
05712 
05713    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfHiddenLayers; i++)
05714    {
05715       for(int j = 0; j < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[i]; j++)
05716       {
05717          hiddenLayers[i][j]
05718          .setNeuronParameters(newNeuralParameters.extract(index, hiddenLayers[i][j].getNumberOfNeuronParameters()));
05719 
05720          index += hiddenLayers[i][j].getNumberOfNeuronParameters();
05721       }
05722    }
05723 
05724    // Output layer parameters
05725 
05726    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfOutputs; i++)
05727    {
05728       outputLayer[i]
05729      .setNeuronParameters(newNeuralParameters.extract(index, outputLayer[i].getNumberOfNeuronParameters()));
05730 
05731       index += outputLayer[i].getNumberOfNeuronParameters();
05732    }
05733 }
05734 
05735 
05736 // void setFreeParameters(Vector<double>) method
05737 
05741 
05742 void MultilayerPerceptron::setFreeParameters(Vector<double> newFreeParameters)
05743 {
05744    // Control sentence (if debug)
05745 
05746    #ifndef NDEBUG 
05747 
05748    int size = newFreeParameters.getSize();
05749 
05750    int numberOfFreeParameters = getNumberOfFreeParameters();
05751 
05752    if(size != numberOfFreeParameters)
05753    {
05754       std::cerr << std::endl
05755                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
05756                 << "void setFreeParameters(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
05757                 << "Size must be equal to number of free parameters." << std::endl
05758                 << std::endl;
05759 
05760       exit(1);
05761    }
05762 
05763    #endif
05764 
05765    // Biases and synaptic weights
05766 
05767    int numberOfNeuralParameters = getNumberOfNeuralParameters();
05768 
05769    Vector<double> newNeuralParameters(numberOfNeuralParameters);
05770 
05771    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfNeuralParameters; i++)
05772    {
05773       newNeuralParameters[i] = newFreeParameters[i];
05774    }
05775 
05776    setNeuralParameters(newNeuralParameters);
05777 
05778    // Scaled independent parameters
05779    
05780    Vector<double> scaledIndependentParameters(numberOfIndependentParameters);
05781 
05782    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfIndependentParameters; i++)
05783    {
05784       scaledIndependentParameters[i] = newFreeParameters[numberOfNeuralParameters+i];
05785    }
05786 
05787    Vector<double> unscaledIndependentParameters = unscaleIndependentParameters(scaledIndependentParameters);
05788 
05789    setIndependentParameters(unscaledIndependentParameters);
05790 }
05791 
05792 
05793 // void initNeuralParametersUniform(void) method
05794 
05797 
05798 void MultilayerPerceptron::initNeuralParametersUniform(void)
05799 {
05800    int numberOfNeuralParameters = getNumberOfNeuralParameters();
05801 
05802    Vector<double> neuralParameters(numberOfNeuralParameters);
05803 
05804    double random;
05805 
05806    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfNeuralParameters; i++)
05807    {
05808       random = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
05809 
05810       neuralParameters[i] = -1.0 + 2.0*random;
05811    }
05812 
05813    setNeuralParameters(neuralParameters);
05814 }
05815 
05816 
05817 // void initNeuralParametersUniform(double, double) method
05818 
05824 
05825 void MultilayerPerceptron::initNeuralParametersUniform(double minimum, double maximum)
05826 {
05827    // Control sentence (if debug)
05828 
05829    #ifndef NDEBUG 
05830 
05831    if(minimum > maximum)
05832    {
05833       std::cerr << std::endl
05834                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl 
05835                 << "void initNeuralParametersUniform(double, double) method." << std::endl
05836                 << "Minimum value must be less or equal than maximum value." << std::endl
05837                 << std::endl;
05838 
05839       exit(1);
05840    }
05841 
05842    #endif
05843 
05844    int numberOfNeuralParameters = getNumberOfNeuralParameters();
05845 
05846    Vector<double> neuralParameters(numberOfNeuralParameters);
05847 
05848    double random;
05849 
05850    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfNeuralParameters; i++)
05851    {
05852       random = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
05853 
05854       neuralParameters[i] = minimum + (maximum - minimum)*random;
05855    }
05856 
05857    setNeuralParameters(neuralParameters);
05858 }
05859 
05860 
05861 // void initNeuralParametersUniform(Vector<double>, Vector<double>) method
05862 
05868 
05869 void MultilayerPerceptron::initNeuralParametersUniform(Vector<double> minimum, Vector<double> maximum)
05870 {
05871    int numberOfNeuralParameters = getNumberOfNeuralParameters();
05872 
05873    // Control sentence (if debug)
05874 
05875    #ifndef NDEBUG 
05876 
05877    int minimumSize = minimum.getSize();
05878    int maximumSize = maximum.getSize();
05879 
05880    if(minimumSize != numberOfNeuralParameters || maximumSize != numberOfNeuralParameters)
05881    {
05882       std::cerr << std::endl
05883                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
05884                 << "void initNeuralParametersUniform(Vector<double>, Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
05885                 << "Sizes must be equal to number of biases and synaptic weights." << std::endl
05886                 << std::endl;
05887 
05888       exit(1);
05889    }
05890 
05891    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfNeuralParameters; i++)
05892    {
05893       if(minimum[i] > maximum[i])
05894       {
05895          std::cerr << std::endl
05896                    << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
05897                    << "void initNeuralParametersUniform(Vector<double>, Vector<double>) method." 
05898                    << std::endl
05899                    << "Minimum value must be less or equal than maximum value." << std::endl
05900                    << std::endl;
05901 
05902          exit(1);
05903       }
05904    }
05905 
05906    #endif
05907 
05908    Vector<double> neuralParameters(numberOfNeuralParameters);
05909 
05910    double random;
05911 
05912    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfNeuralParameters; i++)
05913    {
05914       random = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
05915 
05916       neuralParameters[i] = minimum[i] + (maximum[i] - minimum[i])*random;
05917    }
05918 
05919    setNeuralParameters(numberOfNeuralParameters);
05920 }
05921 
05922 
05923 // void initNeuralParametersUniform(Matrix<double>) method
05924 
05932 
05933 void MultilayerPerceptron::initNeuralParametersUniform(Matrix<double> minimumAndMaximum)
05934 {
05935    int numberOfNeuralParameters = getNumberOfNeuralParameters();
05936 
05937    // Control sentence (if debug)
05938 
05939    #ifndef NDEBUG 
05940 
05941    int numberOfRows = minimumAndMaximum.getNumberOfRows();
05942    int numberOfColumns = minimumAndMaximum.getNumberOfColumns(); 
05943 
05944    if(numberOfRows != 2 || numberOfColumns != numberOfNeuralParameters)
05945    {
05946       std::cerr << std::endl
05947                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl 
05948                 << "void initNeuralParametersUniform(Matrix<double>) method." << std::endl
05949                 << "Numbers of rows and columns must be two and number of biases and synaptic weights, "
05950                 << "respectively." << std::endl 
05951                 << std::endl;
05952 
05953       exit(1);
05954    }
05955 
05956    #endif
05957 
05958    Vector<double> minimum = minimumAndMaximum.getRow(0);
05959    Vector<double> maximum = minimumAndMaximum.getRow(1) ;
05960 
05961    #ifndef NDEBUG 
05962 
05963    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfNeuralParameters; i++)
05964    {
05965       if(minimum[i] > maximum[i])
05966       {
05967          std::cerr << std::endl
05968                    << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
05969                    << "void initNeuralParametersUniform(Vector<double>, Vector<double>) method." 
05970                    << std::endl
05971                    << "Minimum value must be less or equal than maximum value." << std::endl
05972                    << std::endl;
05973 
05974          exit(1);
05975       }
05976    }
05977 
05978    #endif
05979 
05980    Vector<double> neuralParameters(numberOfNeuralParameters);
05981 
05982    double random;
05983 
05984    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfNeuralParameters; i++)
05985    {
05986       random = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
05987 
05988       neuralParameters[i] = minimum[i] + (maximum[i] - minimum[i])*random;
05989    }
05990 
05991    setNeuralParameters(neuralParameters);
05992 }
05993 
05994 
05995 // void initNeuralParametersNormal(void) method
05996 
05999 
06000 void MultilayerPerceptron::initNeuralParametersNormal(void)
06001 {
06002    int numberOfNeuralParameters = getNumberOfNeuralParameters();
06003 
06004    Vector<double> neuralParameters(numberOfNeuralParameters);
06005 
06006    double random;
06007 
06008    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfNeuralParameters; i++)
06009    {
06010       random = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
06011 
06012       neuralParameters[i] = -1.0 + 2.0*random;
06013    }
06014 
06015    setNeuralParameters(neuralParameters);
06016 }
06017 
06018 
06019 // void initNeuralParametersNormal(double, double) method
06020 
06026 
06027 void MultilayerPerceptron
06028 ::initNeuralParametersNormal(double mean, double standardDeviation)
06029 {
06030    // Control sentence (if debug)
06031 
06032    #ifndef NDEBUG 
06033 
06034    if(standardDeviation < 0.0)
06035    {
06036       std::cerr << std::endl
06037                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class."  << std::endl
06038                 << "void initNeuralParametersNormal(double, double) method." << std::endl
06039                 << "Standard deviation must be equal or greater than zero." << std::endl
06040                 << std::endl;
06041 
06042       exit(1);
06043    }
06044 
06045    #endif
06046 
06047    double pi = 4.0*atan(1.0);
06048    double random1 = 0.0;
06049    double random2 = 0.0;
06050 
06051    int numberOfNeuralParameters = getNumberOfNeuralParameters();
06052 
06053    Vector<double> neuralParameters(numberOfNeuralParameters);
06054 
06055    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfNeuralParameters; i++)
06056    {
06057       do 
06058       {
06059          random1 = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
06060 
06061       }while(random1 == 0.0);
06062       
06063       random2 = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
06064 
06065       // Box-Muller transformation
06066 
06067       neuralParameters[i]
06068       = mean + sqrt(-2.0*log(random1))*sin(2.0*pi*random2)*standardDeviation;
06069    }
06070 
06071    setNeuralParameters(neuralParameters);
06072 }
06073 
06074 
06075 // void initNeuralParametersNormal(Vector<double>, Vector<double>) method
06076 
06082 
06083 void MultilayerPerceptron::initNeuralParametersNormal(Vector<double> mean, 
06084 Vector<double> standardDeviation)
06085 {
06086    int numberOfNeuralParameters = getNumberOfNeuralParameters();
06087 
06088    // Control sentence (if debug)
06089 
06090    #ifndef NDEBUG 
06091 
06092    int meanSize = mean.getSize();
06093    int standardDeviationSize = standardDeviation.getSize();
06094 
06095    if(meanSize != numberOfNeuralParameters || standardDeviationSize != numberOfNeuralParameters)
06096    {
06097       std::cerr << std::endl
06098                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
06099                 << "void initNeuralParametersNormal(Vector<double>, Vector<double>) method."  << std::endl
06100                 << "Mean and standard deviation sizes must be equal to number of biases and synaptic weights." 
06101                 << std::endl
06102                 << std::endl;
06103 
06104       exit(1);
06105    }
06106 
06107    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfNeuralParameters; i++)
06108    {
06109       if(standardDeviation[i] < 0.0)
06110       {
06111          std::cerr << std::endl
06112                    << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
06113                    << "void initNeuralParametersNormal(Vector<double>, Vector<double>) method." 
06114                    << std::endl
06115                    << "Standard deviations must equal or greater than zero." << std::endl
06116                    << std::endl;
06117 
06118          exit(1);
06119       }
06120    }
06121 
06122    #endif
06123 
06124    Vector<double> neuralParameters(numberOfNeuralParameters);
06125 
06126    double pi = 4.0*atan(1.0);
06127 
06128    double random1 = 0.0;
06129    double random2 = 0.0;
06130     
06131    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfNeuralParameters; i++)
06132    {
06133      do
06134      {
06135       random1 = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
06136 
06137      }while(random1 == 0.0); 
06138 
06139       random2 = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
06140 
06141       // Box-Muller transformation
06142 
06143       neuralParameters[i]
06144       = mean[i] + sqrt(-2.0*log(random1))*sin(2.0*pi*random2)*standardDeviation[i];
06145    }
06146 
06147    setNeuralParameters(neuralParameters);
06148 }
06149 
06150 
06151 // void initNeuralParametersNormal(Matrix<double>) method
06152 
06160 
06161 void MultilayerPerceptron::initNeuralParametersNormal(Matrix<double> meanAndStandardDeviation)
06162 {
06163    int numberOfNeuralParameters = getNumberOfNeuralParameters();
06164 
06165    // Control sentence (if debug)
06166 
06167    #ifndef NDEBUG 
06168 
06169    int numberOfRows = meanAndStandardDeviation.getNumberOfRows();
06170    int numberOfColumns = meanAndStandardDeviation.getNumberOfColumns();
06171 
06172    if(numberOfRows != 2 || numberOfColumns != numberOfNeuralParameters)
06173    {
06174       std::cerr << std::endl
06175                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl 
06176                 << "void initNeuralParametersNormal(Matrix<double>) method." << std::endl
06177                 << "Numbers of rows and columns must be two and number of biases and synaptic weights, "
06178                                 << "respectively." << std::endl 
06179                 << std::endl;
06180 
06181       exit(1);
06182    }
06183 
06184    #endif
06185 
06186    Vector<double> mean = meanAndStandardDeviation.getRow(0);
06187    Vector<double> standardDeviation = meanAndStandardDeviation.getRow(1);
06188 
06189    #ifndef NDEBUG 
06190 
06191    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfNeuralParameters; i++)
06192    {
06193       if(standardDeviation[i] < 0.0)
06194       {
06195          std::cerr << std::endl
06196                    << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
06197                    << "void initNeuralParametersNormal(Vector<double>, Vector<double>) method." 
06198                    << std::endl
06199                    << "Standard deviations must be equal or greater than zero." << std::endl
06200                    << std::endl;
06201 
06202          exit(1);
06203       }
06204    }
06205 
06206    #endif
06207 
06208    Vector<double> neuralParameters(numberOfNeuralParameters);
06209 
06210    double pi = 4.0*atan(1.0);
06211 
06212    double random1 = 0.0;
06213    double random2 = 0.0;
06214 
06215    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfNeuralParameters; i++)
06216    {
06217       do
06218       {
06219          random1 = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
06220 
06221       }while(random1 == 0.0);
06222 
06223       random2 = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
06224 
06225       // Box-Muller transformation
06226 
06227       neuralParameters[i] = mean[i] + sqrt(-2.0*log(random1))*sin(2.0*pi*random2)*standardDeviation[i];
06228    }
06229 
06230    setNeuralParameters(neuralParameters);
06231 }

06234 // void initIndependentParametersUniform(void) method
06235 
06238 
06239 void MultilayerPerceptron::initIndependentParametersUniform(void)
06240 {
06241    double random = 0.0;
06242 
06243    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfIndependentParameters; i++)
06244    {
06245       random = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
06246 
06247       independentParameters[i] = -1.0 + 2.0*random;
06248    }
06249 }
06250 
06251 
06252 // void initIndependentParametersUniform(double, double) method
06253 
06259 
06260 void MultilayerPerceptron::initIndependentParametersUniform(double minimum, double maximum)
06261 {
06262    // Control sentence (if debug)
06263 
06264    #ifndef NDEBUG 
06265 
06266    if(minimum > maximum)
06267    {
06268       std::cerr << std::endl
06269                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl 
06270                 << "void initIndependentParametersUniform(double, double) method." << std::endl
06271                 << "Minimum value must be less or equal than maximum value." << std::endl
06272                 << std::endl;
06273 
06274       exit(1);
06275    }
06276 
06277    #endif
06278 
06279    double random = 0.0;
06280 
06281    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfIndependentParameters; i++)
06282    {
06283       random = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
06284 
06285       independentParameters[i] = minimum + (maximum - minimum)*random;
06286    }
06287 }
06288

06448    {

06453                 << std::endl;
06454 
06455       exit(1);
06456    }
06457 
06458    #endif
06459 
06460    // Init independent parameters
06461    
06462    double pi = 4.0*atan(1.0);
06463

06465    double random2 = 0.0;
06466

06476

06480    }
