06897       // Box-Muller transformation
06898 
06899       freeParameters[i] = mean + sqrt(-2.0*log(random1))*sin(2.0*pi*random2)*standardDeviation;
06900    }
06901 
06902    setFreeParameters(freeParameters);
06903 }
06904 
06905 
06906 // void initFreeParametersNormal(Vector<double>, Vector<double>) method
06907 
06914 
06915 void MultilayerPerceptron::initFreeParametersNormal(Vector<double> mean, Vector<double> standardDeviation)
06916 {
06917    int numberOfFreeParameters = getNumberOfFreeParameters();
06918 
06919    // Control sentence (if debug)
06920 
06921    #ifndef NDEBUG 
06922 
06923    int meanSize = mean.getSize();
06924    int standardDeviationSize = standardDeviation.getSize();
06925 
06926    if(meanSize != numberOfFreeParameters || standardDeviationSize != numberOfFreeParameters)
06927    {
06928       std::cerr << std::endl
06929                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
06930                 << "void initFreeParametersNormal(Vector<double>, Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
06931                 << "Mean and standard deviation sizes must be equal to number of free parameters." << std::endl 
06932                 << std::endl;
06933 
06934       exit(1);
06935    }
06936 
06937    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfFreeParameters; i++)
06938    {
06939       if(standardDeviation[i] < 0.0)
06940       {
06941          std::cerr << std::endl
06942                    << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
06943                    << "void initFreeParametersNormal(Vector<double>, Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
06944                    << "Standard deviations must equal or greater than zero." << std::endl
06945                    << std::endl;
06946 
06947          exit(1);
06948       }
06949    }
06950 
06951    #endif
06952 
06953    Vector<double> freeParameters(numberOfFreeParameters);
06954 
06955    double pi = 4.0*atan(1.0);
06956    
06957    double random1 = 0.0;
06958    double random2 = 0.0;
06959 
06960    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfFreeParameters; i++)
06961    {
06962       do
06963       {
06964          random1 = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
06965       
06966       }while(random1 == 0.0);
06967 
06968       random2 = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
06969 
06970       // Box-Muller transformation
06971 
06972       freeParameters[i] = mean[i] + sqrt(-2.0*log(random1))*sin(2.0*pi*random2)*standardDeviation[i];
06973    }
06974 
06975    setFreeParameters(freeParameters);
06976 }
06977 
06978 
06979 // void initFreeParametersNormal(Matrix<double>) method
06980 
06989 
06990 void MultilayerPerceptron::initFreeParametersNormal(Matrix<double> meanAndStandardDeviation)
06991 {
06992    int numberOfFreeParameters = getNumberOfFreeParameters();
06993 
06994    // Control sentence (if debug)
06995 
06996    #ifndef NDEBUG 
06997 
06998    int numberOfRows = meanAndStandardDeviation.getNumberOfRows();
06999    int numberOfColumns = meanAndStandardDeviation.getNumberOfColumns();
07000 
07001    if(numberOfRows != 2 || numberOfColumns != numberOfFreeParameters)
07002    {
07003       std::cerr << std::endl
07004                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl 
07005                 << "void initFreeParametersNormal(Matrix<double>) method." << std::endl
07006                 << "Numbers of rows and columns must be two and number of free parameters, respectively." 
07007                 << std::endl << std::endl;
07008 
07009       exit(1);
07010    }
07011 
07012    #endif
07013 
07014    Vector<double> mean = meanAndStandardDeviation.getRow(0);
07015    Vector<double> standardDeviation = meanAndStandardDeviation.getRow(1);
07016 
07017    #ifndef NDEBUG 
07018 
07019    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfFreeParameters; i++)
07020    {
07021       if(standardDeviation[i] < 0.0)
07022       {
07023          std::cerr << std::endl
07024                    << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
07025                    << "void initFreeParametersNormal(Vector<double>, Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
07026                    << "Standard deviations must be equal or greater than zero." << std::endl
07027                    << std::endl;
07028 
07029          exit(1);
07030       }
07031    }
07032 
07033    #endif
07034 
07035    Vector<double> freeParameters(numberOfFreeParameters);
07036 
07037    double pi = 4.0*atan(1.0);
07038   
07039    double random1 = 0.0;
07040    double random2 = 0.0;
07041 
07042    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfFreeParameters; i++)
07043    {
07044       do
07045       {
07046          random1 = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
07047      
07048       }while(random1 == 0.0);
07049 
07050       random2 = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
07051 
07052       // Box-Muller transformation
07053 
07054       freeParameters[i] = mean[i] + sqrt(-2.0*log(random1))*sin(2.0*pi*random2)*standardDeviation[i];
07055    }
07056 
07057    setFreeParameters(freeParameters);
07058 }
07059 
07060 
07061 // void checkInput(Vector<double>) method
07062 
07072 
07073 void MultilayerPerceptron::checkInput(Vector<double> input)
07074 {
07075    // Control sentence (if debug)
07076 
07077    #ifndef NDEBUG 
07078 
07079    int size = input.getSize();
07080 
07081    if(size != numberOfInputs) 
07082    {
07083       std::cerr << std::endl 
07084                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
07085                 << "void checkInput(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
07086                 << "Size of input must be equal to number of inputs." << std::endl
07087                 << std::endl;
07088 
07089       exit(1);
07090    }   
07091 
07092    #endif
07093 
07094    // Check input
07095 
07096    if(displayOutOfRangeWarning)
07097    {
07098       for(int i = 0; i < numberOfInputs; i++)
07099       {
07100          if(input[i] < minimumOfInputVariables[i])
07101          {
07102             std::cout << std::endl 
07103                       << "Flood Warning: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
07104                       << "void checkInput(Vector<double>) method."  << std::endl
07105                       << "Input variable " << i << " is less than minimum." << std::endl;                  
07106          }
07107          if(input[i] > maximumOfInputVariables[i])
07108          {
07109             std::cout << std::endl 
07110                       << "Flood Warning: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
07111                       << "void checkInput(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
07112                       << "Input variable " << i << " is greater than maximum." << std::endl;
07113          }
07114       }
07115    }
07116 }
07117 
07118 
07119 // Vector<double> preprocessInput(Vector<double>) method
07120 
07127 
07128 Vector<double> MultilayerPerceptron::preprocessInput(Vector<double> input)
07129 {
07130    // Control sentence (if debug)
07131 
07132    #ifndef NDEBUG 
07133 
07134    int size = input.getSize();
07135 
07136    if(size != numberOfInputs) 
07137    {
07138       std::cerr << std::endl 
07139                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
07140                 << "Vector<double> preprocessInput(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
07141                 << "Size of input must be equal to number of inputs." << std::endl
07142                 << std::endl;
07143 
07144       exit(1);
07145    }   
07146 
07147    #endif
07148 
07149    // Preprocess input
07150 
07151    Vector<double> inputSignal(numberOfInputs);
07152 
07153    // Preprocess input depending on the pre and postprocessing method
07154 
07155    switch(preAndPostProcessingMethod)
07156    {
07157       case None:
07158       {
07159          inputSignal = input;
07160       }
07161       break;
07162                                      
07163       case MeanAndStandardDeviation:
07164       {
07165          for(int i = 0; i < numberOfInputs; i++)
07166          {            
07167             if(standardDeviationOfInputVariables[i] < 1e-9)
07168             {      
07169                if(display)
07170                {
07171                   std::cout << std::endl 
07172                             << "Flood Warning: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
07173                             << "Vector<double> preprocessInput(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
07174                             << "Standard deviation of input variable " << i << " is zero." << std::endl
07175                             << "Those inputs won't be transformed." << std::endl;
07176                }
07177                
07178                inputSignal[i] = input[i];
07179             }      
07180             else
07181             {             
07182                inputSignal[i] = (input[i] - meanOfInputVariables[i])/standardDeviationOfInputVariables[i];
07183             }
07184          }       
07185       }
07186       break;
07187 
07188       case MinimumAndMaximum:
07189       {
07190          for(int i = 0; i < numberOfInputs; i++)
07191          {
07192             if(maximumOfInputVariables[i]-minimumOfInputVariables[i] < 1e-9)
07193             {      
07194                if(display)
07195                {
07196                   std::cout << "Flood Warning: MultilayerPerceptron class" << std::endl
07197                             << "Vector<double> preprocessInput(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl               
07198                             << "Minimum and maximum values of input variable " << i << " are equal." << std::endl
07199                             << "Those inputs won't be transformed." << std::endl;
07200                }
07201                
07202                inputSignal[i] = input[i];
07203             }      
07204             else
07205             {             
07206                inputSignal[i] = 2.0*(input[i] - minimumOfInputVariables[i])
07207                /(maximumOfInputVariables[i]-minimumOfInputVariables[i]) - 1.0;
07208             }
07209          }
07210       }            
07211       break;
07212 
07213       default:
07214       {
07215          std::cerr << "Flood Warning: MultilayerPerceptron class" << std::endl
07216                    << "Vector<double> preprocessInput(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl               
07217                    << "Unknown pre and postprocessing method." << std::endl;
07218 
07219          exit(1); 
07220       }
07221       break;
07222    }
07223 
07224    return(inputSignal);
07225 }  
07226 
07227 
07228 // Vector<double> calculateNetInputSignalToHiddenLayer(int, Vector<double>) method
07229 
07238 
07239 Vector<double> MultilayerPerceptron::calculateNetInputSignalToHiddenLayer(int index, 
07240 Vector<double> inputSignalToHiddenLayer)
07241 {
07242    // Control sentence (if debug)
07243 
07244 //   #ifndef NDEBUG 
07245 
07246 //   int size = inputSignalToHiddenLayer.getSize();
07247 
07248 //   if(size != numberOfInputs) 
07249 //   {
07250 //      std::cerr << std::endl 
07251 //                << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
07252 //                << "Vector<double> calculateNetInputSignalToHiddenLayer(int, Vector<double>) method." 
07253 //                << std::endl
07254 //                << "Size of input must be equal to number of inputs." << std::endl
07255 //                << std::endl;
07256 
07257 //      exit(1);
07258 //   }   
07259 
07260 //   #endif
07261 
07262    // Calculate net input signal to hidden layer
07263 
07264    Vector<double> netInputSignalToHiddenLayer(numbersOfHiddenNeurons[index]);
07265    
07266    // Calculate net input signal to hidden layer
07267 
07268    for(int j = 0; j < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[index]; j++)
07269    {         
07270       netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[j] = hiddenLayers[index][j].calculateNetInputSignal(inputSignalToHiddenLayer);
07271    }             
07272    
07273    return(netInputSignalToHiddenLayer);
07274 }
07275 
07276 
07277 // Vector<double> calculateOutputSignalFromHiddenLayer(int, Vector<double>) method
07278 
07287 
07288 Vector<double> MultilayerPerceptron::calculateOutputSignalFromHiddenLayer(int index, 
07289 Vector<double> netInputSignalToHiddenLayer)
07290 {
07291    // Control sentence (if debug)
07292 
07293    #ifndef NDEBUG 
07294 
07295    int size = netInputSignalToHiddenLayer.getSize();
07296 
07297    if(size != numbersOfHiddenNeurons[index]) 
07298    {
07299       std::cerr << std::endl 
07300                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
07301                 << "Vector<double> calculateOutputSignalFromHiddenLayer(int, Vector<double>) method." 
07302                 << std::endl
07303                 << "Size must be equal to number of hidden neurons." << std::endl
07304                 << std::endl;
07305 
07306       exit(1);
07307    }   
07308 
07309    #endif
07310 
07311    // Calculate output signal from hidden layer
07312 
07313    Vector<double> outputSignalFromHiddenLayer(numbersOfHiddenNeurons[index]);
07314 
07315    // Calculate output signal from hidden layer
07316 
07317    for(int j = 0; j < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[index]; j++)
07318    {
07319       outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[j] = hiddenLayers[index][j].calculateOutputSignal(netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[j]);
07320    }
07321 
07322    return(outputSignalFromHiddenLayer);
07323 }

07350 //                << "Vector<double> calculateOutputSignalDerivativeFromHiddenLayer(int, Vector<double>) method."

07354

07377 // Vector<double> calculateNetInputSignalToOutputLayer(Vector<double>) method
07378 
07386 
07387 Vector<double> MultilayerPerceptron::calculateNetInputSignalToOutputLayer(Vector<double> outputSignalFromHiddenLayer)
07388 {
07389    // Control sentence (if debug)
07390 
07391 //   #ifndef NDEBUG 
07392 
07393 //   int size = outputSignalFromHiddenLayer.getSize();
07394 
07395 //   if(size != numbersOfHiddenNeurons) 
07396 //   {
07397 //      std::cerr << std::endl 
07398 //                << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
07399 //                << "Vector<double> calculateNetInputSignalToOutputLayer(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
07400 //                << "Size must be equal to number of hidden neurons." << std::endl
07401 //                << std::endl;
07402 
07403 //      exit(1);
07404 //   }   
07405 
07406 //   #endif
07407 
07408    // Calculate net input signal to hidden layer
07409 
07410    Vector<double> netInputSignalToOutputLayer(numberOfOutputs);            
07411                
07412    // Calculate net input signal to output layer
07413 
07414    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfOutputs; i++)
07415    {
07416       netInputSignalToOutputLayer[i] = outputLayer[i].calculateNetInputSignal(outputSignalFromHiddenLayer);
07417    }
07418    
07419    return(netInputSignalToOutputLayer);                  
07420 }

07423 // Vector<double> calculateOutputSignal(Vector<double>) method
07424 
07432 
07433 Vector<double> MultilayerPerceptron::calculateOutputSignal(Vector<double> netInputSignalToOutputLayer)
07434 {
07435    // Control sentence (if debug)
07436 
07437    #ifndef NDEBUG 
07438 
07439    int size = netInputSignalToOutputLayer.getSize();
07440 
07441    if(size != numberOfOutputs) 
07442    {
07443       std::cerr << std::endl 
07444                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
07445                 << "Vector<double> calculateOutputSignal(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
07446                 << "Size must be equal to number of outputs." << std::endl
07447                 << std::endl;
07448 
07449       exit(1);
07450    }   
07451 
07452    #endif
07453 
07454    // Calculate output signal
07455 
07456    Vector<double> outputSignal(numberOfOutputs);
07457 
07458    // Get output signal from output layer
07459 
07460    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfOutputs; i++)
07461    {
07462       outputSignal[i] = outputLayer[i].calculateOutputSignal(netInputSignalToOutputLayer[i]);
07463    }
07464 
07465    return(outputSignal);
07466 }

07469 // Vector<double> calculateOutputSignalDerivative(Vector<double>) method
07470 
07478 
07479 Vector<double> MultilayerPerceptron::calculateOutputSignalDerivative(Vector<double> netInputSignalToOutputLayer)
07480 {
07481    // Control sentence (if debug)
07482 
07483    #ifndef NDEBUG 
07484 
07485    int size = netInputSignalToOutputLayer.getSize();
07486 
07487    if(size != numberOfOutputs) 
07488    {
07489       std::cerr << std::endl 
07490                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
07491                 << "Vector<double> calculateOutputSignalDerivative(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
07492                 << "Size must be equal to number of outputs." << std::endl
07493                 << std::endl;
07494 
07495       exit(1);
07496    }   
07497 
07498    #endif
07499 
07500    // Calculate output signal derivative
07501 
07502    Vector<double> outputSignalDerivative(numberOfOutputs);
07503 
07504    // Get output signal derivative from output layer
07505 
07506    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfOutputs; i++)
07507    {
07508       outputSignalDerivative[i] = outputLayer[i].calculateOutputSignalDerivative(netInputSignalToOutputLayer[i]);
07509    }
07510 
07511    return(outputSignalDerivative);
07512 }  
07513 
07514 
07515 // Vector<double> postprocessOutputSignal(Vector<double>) method
07516 
07524 
07525 Vector<double> MultilayerPerceptron::postprocessOutputSignal(Vector<double> outputSignal)
07526 {
07527    // Control sentence (if debug)
07528 
07529    #ifndef NDEBUG 
07530 
07531    int size = outputSignal.getSize();
07532 
07533    if(size != numberOfOutputs) 
07534    {
07535       std::cerr << std::endl 
07536                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
07537                 << "Vector<double> postprocessOutputSignal(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
07538                 << "Size must be equal to number of outputs." << std::endl
07539                 << std::endl;
07540 
07541       exit(1);
07542    }   
07543 
07544    #endif
07545 
07546    // Postprocess output signal
07547 
07548    Vector<double> output(numberOfOutputs);
07549 
07550    switch(preAndPostProcessingMethod)
07551    {
07552       case None:
07553       {
07554          output = outputSignal;
07555       }// end none
07556       break;
07557 
07558       case MeanAndStandardDeviation:
07559       {
07560          for(int i = 0; i < numberOfOutputs; i++)
07561          {
07562             if(standardDeviationOfOutputVariables[i] < 1e-9)
07563             {      
07564                if(display)
07565                {
07566                   std::cout << "Flood Warning: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
07567                             << "Vector<double> postprocessOutputSignal(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl               
07568                             << "Standard deviation of output variable " << i << " is zero." << std::endl 
07569                             << "Those output signals won't be transformed." << std::endl;
07570                }
07571                
07572                output[i] = outputSignal[i];
07573             }      
07574             else
07575             {
07576                output[i] = outputSignal[i]*standardDeviationOfOutputVariables[i] 
07577                + meanOfOutputVariables[i];
07578             }
07579          }
07580       }// end mean and standard deviation
07581       break;
07582 
07583       case MinimumAndMaximum:
07584       {
07585          for(int i = 0; i < numberOfOutputs; i++)
07586          {
07587             if(maximumOfOutputVariables[i]-minimumOfOutputVariables[i] < 1e-9)
07588             {      
07589                if(display)
07590                {
07591                   std::cout << "Flood Warning: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
07592                             << "Vector<double> postprocessOutputSignal(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl               
07593                             << "Minimum and maximum values of output variable " << i << " are equal." << std::endl
07594                             << "Those output signals won't be transformed."
07595                             << std::endl;
07596                }
07597 
07598                output[i] = outputSignal[i];
07599             }      
07600             else
07601             {
07602                output[i] = 0.5*(outputSignal[i] + 1.0)*(maximumOfOutputVariables[i]-minimumOfOutputVariables[i]) 
07603                + minimumOfOutputVariables[i]; 
07604             }
07605          }
07606       }// end minimum and maximum
07607       break;       
07608 
07609       default:
07610       {
07611          std::cout << "Flood Warning: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
07612                    << "Vector<double> postprocessOutputSignal(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl               
07613                    << "Unknown pre and postprocessing method." << std::endl
07614                    << std::endl;
07615  
07616          exit(1);
07617       }// end default
07618       break;
07619 
07620    }// end swithch
07621 
07622    return(output);
07623 }  
07624 
07625 
07626 // Vector<double> applyLowerAndUpperBounds(Vector<double>) method
07627 
07635 
07636 Vector<double> MultilayerPerceptron::applyLowerAndUpperBounds(Vector<double> output)
07637 {            
07638    // Control sentence (if debug)
07639 
07640    #ifndef NDEBUG 
07641 
07642    int size = output.getSize();
07643 
07644    if(size != numberOfOutputs) 
07645    {
07646       std::cerr << std::endl 
07647                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
07648                 << "Vector<double> applyLowerAndUpperBounds(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
07649                 << "Size must be equal to number of outputs." << std::endl
07650                 << std::endl;
07651 
07652       exit(1);
07653    }   
07654 
07655    #endif
07656 
07657    // Apply lower and upper bounds
07658 
07659    Vector<double> newOutput(numberOfOutputs);
07660 
07661    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfOutputs; i++)
07662    {
07663       if(output[i] < lowerBoundOfOutputVariables[i])
07664       {
07665          newOutput[i] = lowerBoundOfOutputVariables[i];
07666       }
07667       else if(output[i] > upperBoundOfOutputVariables[i])
07668       {
07669          newOutput[i] = upperBoundOfOutputVariables[i];
07670       }
07671       else
07672       {
07673          newOutput[i] =  output[i];
07674       }
07675    }
07676 
07677    return(newOutput);
07678 }  
07679 
07680 
07681 // Vector<double> calculateOutput(Vector<double>) method
07682 
07700 
07701 Vector<double> MultilayerPerceptron::calculateOutput(Vector<double> input)
07702 {
07703    // Control sentence (if debug)
07704 
07705    #ifndef NDEBUG 
07706 
07707    int size = input.getSize();
07708 
07709    if(size != numberOfInputs) 
07710    {
07711       std::cerr << std::endl 
07712                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
07713                 << "Vector<double> calculateOutput(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
07714                 << "Size must be equal to number of inputs." << std::endl
07715                 << std::endl;
07716 
07717       exit(1);
07718    }   
07719 
07720    #endif
07721 
07722    int numberOfHiddenLayers = getNumberOfHiddenLayers();
07723 
07724    // Calculate output
07725 
07726    Vector<double> output(numberOfOutputs);
07727    
07728    // Check input for size and maximum and minimum values
07729  
07730    checkInput(input);
07731  
07732    // Preprocess input to obtain input signal to the neural network 
07733 
07734    Vector<double> inputSignal = preprocessInput(input);
07735 
07736    // Calculate net input and output signals from all hidden layers
07737 
07738    Vector< Vector<double> > netInputSignalToHiddenLayer(numberOfHiddenLayers);
07739    netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[0] = calculateNetInputSignalToHiddenLayer(0, inputSignal);
07740 
07741    Vector< Vector<double> > outputSignalFromHiddenLayer(numberOfHiddenLayers);
07742    outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[0] = calculateOutputSignalFromHiddenLayer(0, netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[0]);
07743    
07744    for(int i = 1; i < numberOfHiddenLayers; i++)
07745    {
07746       netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[i] = calculateNetInputSignalToHiddenLayer(i, outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[i-1]);         
07747       outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[i] = calculateOutputSignalFromHiddenLayer(i, netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[i]);         
07748    }
07749 
07750    // Get net input signal to output layer
07751 
07752    Vector<double> netInputSignalToOutputLayer 
07753    = calculateNetInputSignalToOutputLayer(outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[numberOfHiddenLayers-1]);
07754 
07755    // Get output signal from output layer
07756 
07757    Vector<double> outputSignal = calculateOutputSignal(netInputSignalToOutputLayer);
07758   
07759    // Postprocess output signal from the neural network to get output
07760 
07761    output = postprocessOutputSignal(outputSignal);
07762 
07763    // Apply lower and upper bounds
07764 
07765    output = applyLowerAndUpperBounds(output);
07766 
07767    return(output);
07768 }
07769 
07770 
07771 // Matrix<double> calculateJacobian(Vector<double>) method
07772 
07783 
07784 Matrix<double> MultilayerPerceptron::calculateJacobian(Vector<double> input)
07785 {   
07786    // Check input for size and maximum and minimum values
07787  
07788    checkInput(input);
07789 
07790    int numberOfHiddenLayers = getNumberOfHiddenLayers();
07791 
07792    // Calculate jacobian
07793 
07794    Matrix<double> jacobian(numberOfOutputs, numberOfInputs, 0.0);
07795 
07796    // Preprocess input to obtain input signal to the neural network 
07797 
07798    Vector<double> inputSignal = preprocessInput(input);
07799 
07800    // Calculate net input output and output signal derivative from all hidden layers
07801 
07802    Vector< Vector<double> > netInputSignalToHiddenLayer(numberOfHiddenLayers);
07803    netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[0] = calculateNetInputSignalToHiddenLayer(0, inputSignal);
07804 
07805    Vector< Vector<double> > outputSignalFromHiddenLayer(numberOfHiddenLayers);
07806    outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[0] = calculateOutputSignalFromHiddenLayer(0, netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[0]);
07807 
07808    Vector< Vector<double> > outputSignalDerivativeFromHiddenLayer(numberOfHiddenLayers);
07809    outputSignalDerivativeFromHiddenLayer[0] 
07810    = calculateOutputSignalDerivativeFromHiddenLayer(0, netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[0]);
07811    
07812    for(int i = 1; i < numberOfHiddenLayers; i++)
07813    {
07814       netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[i] = calculateNetInputSignalToHiddenLayer(i, outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[i-1]);
07815 
07816       outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[i] = calculateOutputSignalFromHiddenLayer(i, netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[i]);
07817 
07818       outputSignalDerivativeFromHiddenLayer[i] 
07819       = calculateOutputSignalDerivativeFromHiddenLayer(i, netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[i]);         
07820    }
07821 
07822    // Get net input signal to output layer
07823 
07824    Vector<double> netInputSignalToOutputLayer 
07825    = calculateNetInputSignalToOutputLayer(outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[numberOfHiddenLayers-1]);
07826 
07827    // Calculate output signal derivative
07828 
07829    Vector<double> outputSignalDerivative = calculateOutputSignalDerivative(netInputSignalToOutputLayer);
07830 
07831    // Calculate Jacobian matrix
07832   
07833    double deltaOutput = 0.0;
07834    Vector<double> deltaHidden(numberOfHiddenLayers, 0.0);
07835    
07836    double sum = 0.0;
07837 
07838    for(int k = 0; k < numberOfOutputs; k++)
07839    {
07840       // delta output
07841             
07842       deltaOutput = outputSignalDerivative[k];
07843     
07844       for(int i = 0; i < numberOfInputs; i++)
07845       {      
07846          for(int h = numberOfHiddenLayers-1; h >= 0; h--)
07847          {
07848             for(int j = 0; j < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[h]; j++)
07849             {
07850                sum = 0.0;
07851                 
07852                sum += outputLayer[k].getSingleSynapticWeight(j)*deltaOutput;
07853             
07854                deltaHidden[h] = outputSignalDerivativeFromHiddenLayer[h][j]*sum;
07855 
07856                // Jacobian matrix 
07857   
07858                if(h == 0)
07859                {  
07860                   jacobian[k][i] += hiddenLayers[h][j].getSingleSynapticWeight(i)*deltaHidden[h];
07861                }
07862                else
07863                {
07864 
07865                } 
07866             }
07867          }
07868       }
07869    }
07870 
07871    return(jacobian);
07872 }
07873 
07874 
07875 // Matrix<double> calculateJacobianTest(Vector<double>) method
07876 
07885 
07886 Matrix<double> MultilayerPerceptron::calculateJacobianTest(Vector<double> input)
07887 {
07888    // Check input for size and maximum and minimum values
07889  
07890    checkInput(input);
07891 
07892    int numberOfHiddenLayers = getNumberOfHiddenLayers();
07893 
07894    // Calculate jacobian
07895 
07896    Matrix<double> jacobian(numberOfOutputs, numberOfInputs);
07897 
07898    // Preprocess input to obtain input signal to the neural network 
07899 
07900    Vector<double> inputSignal = preprocessInput(input);
07901 
07902    switch(numericalDifferentiationMethod)   
07903    {
07904       case ForwardDifferences:
07905       {
07906          // Calculate output signal for input signal
07907 
07908          Vector< Vector<double> > netInputSignalToHiddenLayer(numberOfHiddenLayers);
07909          netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[0] = calculateNetInputSignalToHiddenLayer(0, inputSignal);
07910 
07911          Vector< Vector<double> > outputSignalFromHiddenLayer(numberOfHiddenLayers);
07912          outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[0] = calculateOutputSignalFromHiddenLayer(0, netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[0]);
07913    
07914          for(int i = 1; i < numberOfHiddenLayers; i++)
07915          {
07916             netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[i] 
07917             = calculateNetInputSignalToHiddenLayer(i, outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[i-1]);         
07918       
07919             outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[i] 
07920             = calculateOutputSignalFromHiddenLayer(i, netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[i]);         
07921          }
07922 
07923          Vector<double> netInputSignalToOutputLayer 
07924          = calculateNetInputSignalToOutputLayer(outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[numberOfHiddenLayers-1]);
07925          Vector<double> outputSignal = calculateOutputSignal(netInputSignalToOutputLayer);
07926          // Calculate output signal for input signal forward
07927 
07928          Vector<double> inputSignalForward = inputSignal;
07929          Vector< Vector<double> > netInputSignalToHiddenLayerForward(numberOfHiddenLayers);  
07930          Vector< Vector<double> > outputSignalFromHiddenLayerForward(numberOfHiddenLayers);  
07931          Vector<double> netInputSignalToOutputLayerForward(numberOfOutputs);  
07932          Vector<double> outputSignalForward(numberOfOutputs); 
07933 
07934          for(int i = 0; i < numberOfInputs; i++)
07935          {
07936             // Perturbate input signals
07937 
07938             inputSignalForward[i] += numericalEpsilon;
07939             // Calculate output signal             
07940 
07941             netInputSignalToHiddenLayerForward[0] = calculateNetInputSignalToHiddenLayer(0, inputSignalForward);
07942 
07943             outputSignalFromHiddenLayerForward[0] 
07944             = calculateOutputSignalFromHiddenLayer(0, netInputSignalToHiddenLayerForward[0]);
07945    
07946             for(int j = 1; j < numberOfHiddenLayers; j++)
07947             {
07948                netInputSignalToHiddenLayerForward[j] 
07949                = calculateNetInputSignalToHiddenLayer(j, outputSignalFromHiddenLayerForward[j-1]);         
07950       
07951                outputSignalFromHiddenLayerForward[j] 
07952                = calculateOutputSignalFromHiddenLayer(j, netInputSignalToHiddenLayerForward[j]);         
07953             }
07954 
07955             netInputSignalToOutputLayerForward 
07956             = calculateNetInputSignalToOutputLayer(outputSignalFromHiddenLayerForward[numberOfHiddenLayers-1]);
07957 
07958             outputSignalForward = calculateOutputSignal(netInputSignalToOutputLayerForward);
07959 
07960             // Calculate jacobian
07961 
07962             for(int k = 0; k < numberOfOutputs; k++)
07963             {
07964                jacobian[k][i] = (outputSignalForward[k] - outputSignal[k])/numericalEpsilon;
07965             }
07966 
07967             // Restart original input signals
07968 
07969             inputSignalForward[i] -= numericalEpsilon;
07970          }
07971       }                               
07972       break;
07973 
07974       case CentralDifferences:
07975       {
07976          Vector<double> inputSignalForward = inputSignal;
07977          Vector<double> inputSignalBackward = inputSignal;
07978          Vector< Vector<double> > netInputSignalToHiddenLayerForward(numberOfHiddenLayers);  
07979          Vector< Vector<double> > netInputSignalToHiddenLayerBackward(numberOfHiddenLayers);  
07980 
07981          Vector< Vector<double> > outputSignalFromHiddenLayerForward(numberOfHiddenLayers);  
07982          Vector< Vector<double> > outputSignalFromHiddenLayerBackward(numberOfHiddenLayers);  
07983 
07984          Vector<double> netInputSignalToOutputLayerForward(numberOfOutputs);  
07985          Vector<double> netInputSignalToOutputLayerBackward(numberOfOutputs);  
07986 
07987          Vector<double> outputSignalForward(numberOfOutputs); 
07988          Vector<double> outputSignalBackward(numberOfOutputs); 
07989 
07990          for(int i = 0; i < numberOfInputs; i++)
07991          {
07992             // Perturbate input signals
07993 
07994             inputSignalForward[i] += numericalEpsilon;
07995             inputSignalBackward[i] -= numericalEpsilon;
07996 
07997             // Calculate output signals             
07998 
07999             netInputSignalToHiddenLayerForward[0] = calculateNetInputSignalToHiddenLayer(0, inputSignalForward);
08000             netInputSignalToHiddenLayerBackward[0] = calculateNetInputSignalToHiddenLayer(0, inputSignalBackward);
08001 
08002             outputSignalFromHiddenLayerForward[0] 
08003             = calculateOutputSignalFromHiddenLayer(0, netInputSignalToHiddenLayerForward[0]);
08004 
08005             outputSignalFromHiddenLayerBackward[0] 
08006             = calculateOutputSignalFromHiddenLayer(0, netInputSignalToHiddenLayerBackward[0]);
08007    
08008             for(int j = 1; j < numberOfHiddenLayers; j++)
08009             {
08010                netInputSignalToHiddenLayerForward[j] 
08011                = calculateNetInputSignalToHiddenLayer(j, outputSignalFromHiddenLayerForward[j-1]);         
08012 
08013                netInputSignalToHiddenLayerBackward[j] 
08014                = calculateNetInputSignalToHiddenLayer(j, outputSignalFromHiddenLayerBackward[j-1]);         
08015       
08016                outputSignalFromHiddenLayerForward[j] 
08017                = calculateOutputSignalFromHiddenLayer(j, netInputSignalToHiddenLayerForward[j]);         
08018 
08019                outputSignalFromHiddenLayerBackward[j] 
08020                = calculateOutputSignalFromHiddenLayer(j, netInputSignalToHiddenLayerBackward[j]);         
08021             }
08022 
08023             netInputSignalToOutputLayerForward 
08024             = calculateNetInputSignalToOutputLayer(outputSignalFromHiddenLayerForward[numberOfHiddenLayers-1]);
08025 
08026             netInputSignalToOutputLayerBackward 
08027             = calculateNetInputSignalToOutputLayer(outputSignalFromHiddenLayerBackward[numberOfHiddenLayers-1]);
08028 
08029             outputSignalForward = calculateOutputSignal(netInputSignalToOutputLayerForward);
08030             outputSignalBackward = calculateOutputSignal(netInputSignalToOutputLayerBackward);
08031 
08032             // Calculate jacobian
08033 
08034             for(int k = 0; k < numberOfOutputs; k++)
08035             {
08036                jacobian[k][i] = (outputSignalForward[k] - outputSignalBackward[k])/(2.0*numericalEpsilon);
08037             }
08038 
08039             // Restart original input signals
08040 
08041             inputSignalForward[i] -= numericalEpsilon;
08042             inputSignalBackward[i] += numericalEpsilon;
08043          }
08044 
08045       }// end central differences
08046       break;
08047 
08048       default:
08049       {
08050          std::cerr << std::endl 
08051                    << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
08052                    << "Matrix<double> calculateJacobianTest(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
08053                    << "Unknown numerical differentiation method." << std::endl
08054                    << std::endl;
08055  
08056          exit(1);
08057       }// end default
08058       break;
08059 
08060    }// end numerical differentiation method switch
08061 
08062    return(jacobian);
08063 }
08064 
08065 
08066 // Matrix<double> calculateSensitivityTest(Vector<double> input)
08067 
08070 
08071 Matrix<double> MultilayerPerceptron::calculateSensitivityTest(Vector<double> input)
08072 {
08073    // Check input for size and maximum and minimum values
08074  
08075    checkInput(input);
08076 
08077    int numberOfHiddenLayers = getNumberOfHiddenLayers();
08078 
08079    int numberOfNeuralParameters = getNumberOfNeuralParameters();
08080 
08081    // Calculate sensitivity
08082 
08083    Matrix<double> sensitivity(numberOfOutputs, numberOfNeuralParameters);
08084 
08085    // Preprocess input to obtain input signal to the neural network 
08086 
08087    Vector<double> inputSignal = preprocessInput(input);
08088 
08089    switch(numericalDifferentiationMethod)   
08090    {
08091       case ForwardDifferences:
08092       {
08093          // Calculate output signal for input signal and neural parameters
08094 
08095          Vector<double> neuralParameters = getNeuralParameters();
08096 
08097          Vector< Vector<double> > netInputSignalToHiddenLayer(numberOfHiddenLayers);
08098          netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[0] = calculateNetInputSignalToHiddenLayer(0, inputSignal);
08099 
08100          Vector< Vector<double> > outputSignalFromHiddenLayer(numberOfHiddenLayers);
08101          outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[0] = calculateOutputSignalFromHiddenLayer(0, netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[0]);
08102    
08103          for(int i = 1; i < numberOfHiddenLayers; i++)
08104          {
08105             netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[i] 
08106             = calculateNetInputSignalToHiddenLayer(i, outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[i-1]);         
08107       
08108             outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[i] 
08109             = calculateOutputSignalFromHiddenLayer(i, netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[i]);         
08110          }
08111 
08112          Vector<double> netInputSignalToOutputLayer 
08113          = calculateNetInputSignalToOutputLayer(outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[numberOfHiddenLayers-1]);
08114 
08115          Vector<double> outputSignal = calculateOutputSignal(netInputSignalToOutputLayer);
08116 
08117          // Calculate output signal for input signal and neural parameters forward
08118 
08119          Vector<double> neuralParametersForward = neuralParameters;
08120 
08121          Vector< Vector<double> > netInputSignalToHiddenLayerForward(numberOfHiddenLayers);  
08122          Vector< Vector<double> > outputSignalFromHiddenLayerForward(numberOfHiddenLayers);  
08123          Vector<double> netInputSignalToOutputLayerForward(numberOfOutputs);  
08124          Vector<double> outputSignalForward(numberOfOutputs); 
08125 
08126          for(int i = 0; i < numberOfNeuralParameters; i++)
08127          {
08128             // Perturbate single neural parameter
08129 
08130             neuralParametersForward[i] += numericalEpsilon;
08131             setNeuralParameters(neuralParametersForward);
08132 
08133             // Calculate output signal             
08134 
08135             netInputSignalToHiddenLayerForward[0] = calculateNetInputSignalToHiddenLayer(0, inputSignal);
08136 
08137             outputSignalFromHiddenLayerForward[0] 
08138             = calculateOutputSignalFromHiddenLayer(0, netInputSignalToHiddenLayerForward[0]);
08139    
08140             for(int j = 1; j < numberOfHiddenLayers; j++)
08141             {
08142                netInputSignalToHiddenLayerForward[j] 
08143                = calculateNetInputSignalToHiddenLayer(j, outputSignalFromHiddenLayerForward[j-1]);         
08144       
08145                outputSignalFromHiddenLayerForward[j] 
08146                = calculateOutputSignalFromHiddenLayer(j, netInputSignalToHiddenLayerForward[j]);         
08147             }
08148 
08149             netInputSignalToOutputLayerForward 
08150             = calculateNetInputSignalToOutputLayer(outputSignalFromHiddenLayerForward[numberOfHiddenLayers-1]);
08151 
08152             outputSignalForward = calculateOutputSignal(netInputSignalToOutputLayerForward);
08153 
08154             // Calculate sensitivity
08155 
08156             for(int k = 0; k < numberOfOutputs; k++)
08157             {
08158                sensitivity[k][i] = (outputSignalForward[k] - outputSignal[k])/numericalEpsilon;
08159             }
08160 
08161             // Restart original neural parameters
08162 
08163             neuralParametersForward[i] -= numericalEpsilon;
08164             setNeuralParameters(neuralParametersForward);
08165          }
08166       }                               
08167       break;
08168 
08169       case CentralDifferences:
08170       {
08171          Vector<double> neuralParametersForward = getNeuralParameters();
08172          Vector<double> neuralParametersBackward = getNeuralParameters();
08173 
08174          Vector< Vector<double> > netInputSignalToHiddenLayerForward(numberOfHiddenLayers);  
08175          Vector< Vector<double> > netInputSignalToHiddenLayerBackward(numberOfHiddenLayers);  
08176 
08177          Vector< Vector<double> > outputSignalFromHiddenLayerForward(numberOfHiddenLayers);  
08178          Vector< Vector<double> > outputSignalFromHiddenLayerBackward(numberOfHiddenLayers);  
08179 
08180          Vector<double> netInputSignalToOutputLayerForward(numberOfOutputs);  
08181          Vector<double> netInputSignalToOutputLayerBackward(numberOfOutputs);  
08182 
08183          Vector<double> outputSignalForward(numberOfOutputs); 
08184          Vector<double> outputSignalBackward(numberOfOutputs); 
08185 
08186          for(int i = 0; i < numberOfNeuralParameters; i++)
08187          {
08188             // Perturbate neural parameters
08189 
08190             neuralParametersForward[i] += numericalEpsilon;
08191             setNeuralParameters(neuralParametersForward);
08192 
08193             // Calculate output signal             
08194 
08195             netInputSignalToHiddenLayerForward[0] = calculateNetInputSignalToHiddenLayer(0, inputSignal);
08196 
08197             outputSignalFromHiddenLayerForward[0] 
08198             = calculateOutputSignalFromHiddenLayer(0, netInputSignalToHiddenLayerForward[0]);
08199    
08200             for(int j = 1; j < numberOfHiddenLayers; j++)
08201             {
08202                netInputSignalToHiddenLayerForward[j] 
08203                = calculateNetInputSignalToHiddenLayer(j, outputSignalFromHiddenLayerForward[j-1]);         
08204       
08205                outputSignalFromHiddenLayerForward[j] 
08206                = calculateOutputSignalFromHiddenLayer(j, netInputSignalToHiddenLayerForward[j]);         
08207             }
08208 
08209             netInputSignalToOutputLayerForward 
08210             = calculateNetInputSignalToOutputLayer(outputSignalFromHiddenLayerForward[numberOfHiddenLayers-1]);
08211 
08212             outputSignalForward = calculateOutputSignal(netInputSignalToOutputLayerForward);
08213 
08214             // Restart original neural parameters
08215 
08216             neuralParametersForward[i] -= numericalEpsilon;
08217             setNeuralParameters(neuralParametersForward);
08218 
08219             // Perturbate neural parameters
08220 
08221             neuralParametersBackward[i] -= numericalEpsilon;
08222             setNeuralParameters(neuralParametersBackward);
08223 
08224             // Calculate output signal             
08225 
08226             netInputSignalToHiddenLayerBackward[0] = calculateNetInputSignalToHiddenLayer(0, inputSignal);
08227 
08228             outputSignalFromHiddenLayerBackward[0] 
08229             = calculateOutputSignalFromHiddenLayer(0, netInputSignalToHiddenLayerBackward[0]);
08230    
08231             for(int j = 1; j < numberOfHiddenLayers; j++)
08232             {
08233                netInputSignalToHiddenLayerBackward[j] 
08234                = calculateNetInputSignalToHiddenLayer(j, outputSignalFromHiddenLayerBackward[j-1]);         
08235       
08236                outputSignalFromHiddenLayerBackward[j] 
08237                = calculateOutputSignalFromHiddenLayer(j, netInputSignalToHiddenLayerBackward[j]);         
08238             }
08239 
08240             netInputSignalToOutputLayerBackward 
08241             = calculateNetInputSignalToOutputLayer(outputSignalFromHiddenLayerBackward[numberOfHiddenLayers-1]);
08242 
08243             outputSignalBackward = calculateOutputSignal(netInputSignalToOutputLayerBackward);
08244             // Restart original neural parameters
08245 
08246             neuralParametersBackward[i] += numericalEpsilon;
08247             setNeuralParameters(neuralParametersBackward);       
08248 
08249             // Calculate sensitivity
08250 
08251             for(int k = 0; k < numberOfOutputs; k++)
08252             {
08253                sensitivity[k][i] = (outputSignalForward[k] - outputSignalBackward[k])/(2.0*numericalEpsilon);
08254             }
08255 
08256          }
08257 
08258       }// end central differences
08259       break;
08260 
08261       default:
08262       {
08263          std::cerr << std::endl 
08264                    << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
08265                    << "Matrix<double> calculateSensitivityTest(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
08266                    << "Unknown numerical differentiation method." << std::endl
08267                    << std::endl;
08268  
08269          exit(1);
08270       }// end default
08271       break;
08272 
08273    }// end numerical differentiation method switch
08274 
08275    return(sensitivity);
08276 }

08279 // void print(void) method
08280 
08325 
08326 void MultilayerPerceptron::print(void)
08327 {
08328 
08329    // Print header
08330 
08331    std::cout << std::endl
08332              << "Flood Neural Network. Multilayer Perceptron Object." << std::endl;
08333 
08334    // Print network architecture
08335 
08336    int numberOfHiddenLayers = getNumberOfHiddenLayers();
08337 
08338    std::cout << "Number of inputs:" << std::endl 
08339              << numberOfInputs << std::endl
08340              << "Number of hidden layers:" << std::endl
08341              << numberOfHiddenLayers << std::endl
08342              << "Numbers of hidden neurons:" << std::endl
08343              << numbersOfHiddenNeurons << std::endl
08344              << "Number of outputs:" << std::endl
08345              << numberOfOutputs << std::endl;
08346 
08347    // Print hidden layer activation function
08348 
08349    std::cout << "Hidden layers activation function:" << std::endl;
08350 
08351    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfHiddenLayers; i++)
08352    {
08353       switch(hiddenLayersActivationFunction[i])
08354       {
08355          case Perceptron::Logistic:
08356          {
08357             std::cout << "Logistic ";
08358          }
08359          break;
08360 
08361          case Perceptron::HyperbolicTangent:
08362          {
08363             std::cout << "HyperbolicTangent ";
08364          }
08365          break;
08366 
08367          case Perceptron::Linear:
08368          {
08369             std::cout << "Linear ";
08370          }
08371          break;
08372 
08373          default:
08374          {
08375             std::cerr << std::endl 
08376                       << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
08377                       << "void print(void) method." << std::endl
08378                       << "Unknown hidden layer activation function." << std::endl
08379                       << std::endl;
08380  
08381             exit(1);
08382          }
08383          break;
08384       }
08385    }
08386 
08387    std::cout << std::endl;
08388 
08389    // Print output layer activation function
08390 
08391    std::cout << "Output layer activation function:" << std::endl;
08392 
08393    switch(outputLayerActivationFunction)
08394    {
08395       case Perceptron::Logistic:
08396      {
08397         std::cout << "Logistic" << std::endl;
08398      }
08399      break;
08400 
08401      case Perceptron::HyperbolicTangent:
08402      {
08403         std::cout << "HyperbolicTangent" << std::endl;
08404      }
08405      break;
08406 
08407      case Perceptron::Linear:
08408      {
08409         std::cout << "Linear" << std::endl;
08410      }
08411      break;
08412 
08413      default:
08414      {
08415          std::cerr << std::endl 
08416                    << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
08417                    << "void print(void) method." << std::endl
08418                    << "Unknown output layer activation function." << std::endl
08419                    << std::endl;
08420  
08421          exit(1);
08422      }
08423      break;
08424    }
08425 
08426    // Print name of input variables
08427 
08428    std::cout << "Name of input variables:" << std::endl
08429              << nameOfInputVariables << std::endl;
08430 
08431    // Print name of output variables
08432 
08433    std::cout << "Name of output variables:" << std::endl
08434              << nameOfOutputVariables << std::endl;
08435 
08436    // Print units of input variables
08437 
08438    std::cout << "Units of input variables:" << std::endl
08439              << unitsOfInputVariables << std::endl;
08440 
08441    // Print units of output variables
08442 
08443    std::cout << "Units of output variables:" << std::endl
08444              << unitsOfOutputVariables << std::endl;
08445 
08446    // Print description of input variables
08447 
08448    std::cout << "Description of input variables:" << std::endl
08449              << descriptionOfInputVariables << std::endl;
08450 
08451    // Print description of output variables
08452 
08453    std::cout << "Description of output variables:" << std::endl
08454              << descriptionOfOutputVariables << std::endl;
08455 
08456    // Print mean of input variables
08457 
08458    std::cout << "Mean of input variables:" << std::endl
08459              << meanOfInputVariables << std::endl;
08460 
08461    // Print standard deviation of input variables 
08462 
08463    std::cout << "Standard deviation of input variables:" << std::endl
08464              << standardDeviationOfInputVariables << std::endl;
08465 
08466    // Print mean of output variables
08467 
08468    std::cout << "Mean of output variables:" << std::endl
08469              << meanOfOutputVariables << std::endl;
08470 
08471    // Print standard deviation of output variables
08472 
08473    std::cout << "Standard deviation of output variables:" << std::endl
08474              << standardDeviationOfOutputVariables << std::endl;
08475  
08476    // Print minimum of input variables
08477 
08478    std::cout << "Minimum of input variables:" << std::endl
08479              << minimumOfInputVariables << std::endl;
08480 
08481    // Print maximum of input variables
08482 
08483    std::cout << "Maximum of input variables:" << std::endl
08484              << maximumOfInputVariables << std::endl;
08485    
08486    // Print minimum of output variables
08487 
08488    std::cout << "Minimum of output variables:" << std::endl
08489              << minimumOfOutputVariables << std::endl;
08490 
08491    // Print maximum of output variables
08492 
08493    std::cout << "Maximum of output variables:" << std::endl
08494              << maximumOfOutputVariables << std::endl;
08495 
08496    // Print lower bound of output variables
08497 
08498    std::cout << "Lower bound of output variables:" << std::endl
08499              << lowerBoundOfOutputVariables << std::endl;
08500 
08501    // Print upper bound of output variables
08502 
08503    std::cout << "Upper bound of output variables:" << std::endl
08504              << upperBoundOfOutputVariables << std::endl;
08505 
08506    // Print biases and synaptic weigths
08507 
08508    Vector<double> neuralParameters = getNeuralParameters();
08509 
08510    std::cout << "Neural parameters: " << std::endl 
08511              << neuralParameters << std::endl;
08512 
08513    // Print number of independent parameters
08514 
08515    std::cout << "Number of independent parameters: " << std::endl 
08516              << numberOfIndependentParameters << std::endl;
08517              
08518    // Print name of independent parameters
08519 
08520    std::cout << "Name of independent parameters:" << std::endl
08521              << nameOfIndependentParameters << std::endl;
08522 
08523    // Print units of independent parameters
08524 
08525    std::cout << "Units of independent parameters:" << std::endl
08526              << unitsOfIndependentParameters << std::endl;
08527 
08528    // Print description of independent parameters
08529 
08530    std::cout << "Description of independent parameters:" << std::endl
08531              << descriptionOfIndependentParameters << std::endl;
08532 
08533    // Print mean of independent parameters
08534 
08535    std::cout << "Mean of independent parameters:" << std::endl
08536              << meanOfIndependentParameters << std::endl;
08537 
08538    // Print standard deviation of independent parameters
08539 
08540    std::cout << "Standard deviation of independent parameters:" << std::endl
08541              << standardDeviationOfIndependentParameters << std::endl;
08542 
08543    // Print minimum of independent parameters
08544 
08545    std::cout << "Minimum of independent parameters:" << std::endl
08546              << minimumOfIndependentParameters << std::endl;
08547 
08548    // Print maximum of independent parameters
08549 
08550    std::cout << "Maximum of independent parameters:" << std::endl
08551              << maximumOfIndependentParameters << std::endl;
08552 
08553    // Print lower bound of independent parameters
08554 
08555    std::cout << "Lower bound of independent parameters:" << std::endl
08556              << lowerBoundOfIndependentParameters << std::endl;
08557 
08558    // Print upper bound of independent parameters
08559 
08560    std::cout << "Upper bound of independent parameters:" << std::endl
08561              << upperBoundOfIndependentParameters << std::endl;
08562  
08563    // Print independent parameters
08564 
08565    std::cout << "Independent parameters:" << std::endl 
08566              << independentParameters << std::endl;
08567 
08568    // Print pre and post processing method 
08569 
08570    std::cout << "Pre and post processing method:" << std::endl;
08571 
08572    if(preAndPostProcessingMethod == None)
08573    {
08574       std::cout << "None" << std::endl;
08575    }
08576    else if(preAndPostProcessingMethod == MeanAndStandardDeviation)
08577    {
08578       std::cout << "Mean and standard deviation" << std::endl;
08579    }
08580    else if(preAndPostProcessingMethod == MinimumAndMaximum)
08581    {
08582       std::cout << "Minimum and maximum" << std::endl;
08583    }
08584    else
08585    {
08586       std::cerr << std::endl 
08587                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
08588                 << "void print(void) method." << std::endl
08589                 << "Unknown pre and postprocessing method." << std::endl
08590                 << std::endl;
08591  
08592       exit(1);
08593    }
08594 
08595    // Print numerical differentiation method 
08596 
08597    std::cout << "Numerical differentiation method:" << std::endl;
08598 
08599    if(numericalDifferentiationMethod == ForwardDifferences)
08600    {
08601       std::cout << "Forward differences" << std::endl;
08602    }
08603    else if(numericalDifferentiationMethod == CentralDifferences)
08604    {
08605       std::cout << "Central differences" << std::endl;
08606    }
08607    else
08608    {
08609       std::cerr << std::endl 
08610                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
08611                 << "void print(void) method." << std::endl
08612                 << "Unknown numerical differentiation method." << std::endl
08613                 << std::endl;
08614  
08615       exit(1);
08616    }
08617 
08618    // Print display out of range warning
08619 
08620    std::cout << "Display out of range warning:" << std::endl
08621              << displayOutOfRangeWarning << std::endl;
08622 
08623    // Print display 
08624 
08625    std::cout << "Display:" << std::endl
08626              << display << std::endl;
08627 
08628    // Print numerical epsilon
08629 
08630    std::cout << "Numercial epsilon:" << std::endl
08631              << numericalEpsilon << std::endl;
08632 
08633 }

08635 
08636 // void save(char*) method 
08637 
08675 
08676 void MultilayerPerceptron::save(char* filename)
08677 {
08678    std::fstream file; 
08679 
08680    file.open(filename, std::ios::out);
08681 
08682    if(!file.is_open())
08683    {
08684       std::cerr << std::endl 
08685                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
08686                 << "void save(char*) method." << std::endl
08687                 << "Cannot open multilayer perceptron data file." << std::endl
08688                 << std::endl;
08689 
08690       exit(1);
08691    }
08692    else
08693    {
08694       if(display)
08695       {
08696          std::cout << std::endl 
08697                    << "Saving multilayer perceptron to data file..." 
08698                    << std::endl;
08699       }
08700    }
08701 
08702    // Write file header
08703 
08704    file << "% Flood Neural Network. Multilayer Perceptron Object." << std::endl;
08705 
08706    // Write network architecture
08707 
08708    int numberOfHiddenLayers = getNumberOfHiddenLayers();
08709 
08710    file << "NumberOfInputs:" << std::endl
08711         << numberOfInputs << std::endl
08712         << "NumberOfHiddenLayers:" << std::endl
08713         << numberOfHiddenLayers << std::endl
08714         << "NumbersOfHiddenNeurons:" << std::endl
08715         << numbersOfHiddenNeurons << std::endl
08716         << "NumberOfOutputs:" << std::endl
08717         << numberOfOutputs << std::endl;
08718 
08719    // Write hidden layer activation function
08720 
08721    file << "HiddenLayersActivationFunction:" << std::endl;
08722 
08723    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfHiddenLayers; i++)
08724    {
08725       switch(hiddenLayersActivationFunction[i])   
08726       {
08727          case Perceptron::Logistic:
08728          {
08729             file << "Logistic ";
08730          }
08731          break;
08732 
08733          case Perceptron::HyperbolicTangent:
08734          {
08735             file << "HyperbolicTangent ";
08736          }
08737          break;
08738 
08739          case Perceptron::Linear:
08740          {
08741             file << "Linear ";
08742          }
08743          break;
08744 
08745          default:
08746          {
08747             std::cerr << std::endl 
08748                       << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
08749                       << "void save(char*) method." << std::endl
08750                       << "Unknown hidden layer activation function." << std::endl
08751                       << std::endl;
08752     
08753             exit(1);
08754          }
08755          break;
08756       }
08757    }
08758 
08759    file << std::endl;
08760 
08761    // Write output layer activation function
08762 
08763    file << "OutputLayerActivationFunction:" << std::endl;
08764 
08765    switch(outputLayerActivationFunction)   
08766    {
08767       case Perceptron::Logistic:
08768       {
08769          file << "Logistic" << std::endl;
08770       }
08771       break;
08772 
08773       case Perceptron::HyperbolicTangent:
08774       {
08775          file << "HyperbolicTangent" << std::endl;
08776       }
08777       break;
08778 
08779       case Perceptron::Linear:
08780       {
08781          file << "Linear" << std::endl;
08782       }
08783       break;
08784 
08785       default:
08786       {
08787          std::cerr << std::endl 
08788                    << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
08789                    << "void save(char*) method." << std::endl
08790                    << "Unknown output layer activation function." << std::endl
08791                    << std::endl;
08792  
08793          exit(1);
08794       }
08795       break;
08796    }
08797 
08798    // Write name of input variables
08799 
08800    file << "NameOfInputVariables:" << std::endl 
08801         << nameOfInputVariables << std::endl;
08802 
08803    // Write name of output variables
08804 
08805    file << "NameOfOutputVariables:" << std::endl
08806         << nameOfOutputVariables << std::endl;
08807 
08808    // Write units of input variables
08809 
08810    file << "UnitsOfInputVariables:" << std::endl 
08811         << unitsOfInputVariables << std::endl;
08812 
08813    // Write units of output variables
08814 
08815    file << "UnitsOfOutputVariables:" << std::endl
08816         << unitsOfOutputVariables << std::endl;
08817 
08818    // Write description of input variables
08819 
08820    file << "DescriptionOfInputVariables:" << std::endl 
08821         << descriptionOfInputVariables << std::endl;
08822 
08823    // Write description of output variables
08824 
08825    file << "DescriptionOfOutputVariables:" << std::endl
08826         << descriptionOfOutputVariables << std::endl;
08827 
08828    // Write mean of input variables
08829 
08830    file << "MeanOfInputVariables:" << std::endl
08831         << meanOfInputVariables << std::endl;
08832 
08833     // Write standard deviation of input variables
08834 
08835    file << "StandardDeviationOfInputVariables:" << std::endl
08836         << standardDeviationOfInputVariables << std::endl;
08837   
08838    // Write mean output variables
08839 
08840    file << "MeanOfOutputVariables:" << std::endl
08841         << meanOfOutputVariables << std::endl;
08842 
08843    // Write standard deviation of output variables
08844 
08845    file << "StandardDeviationOfOutputVariables:" << std::endl
08846         << standardDeviationOfOutputVariables << std::endl;
08847 
08848    // Write minimum of input variables
08849 
08850    file << "MinimumOfInputVariables:" << std::endl
08851         << minimumOfInputVariables << std::endl;
08852 
08853    // Write maximum of input variables
08854 
08855    file << "MaximumOfInputVariables:" << std::endl
08856         << maximumOfInputVariables << std::endl;
08857 
08858    // Write minimum of output variables
08859 
08860    file << "MinimumOfOutputVariables:" << std::endl 
08861         << minimumOfOutputVariables << std::endl;
08862 
08863    // Write maximum of output variables
08864 
08865    file << "MaximumOfOutputVariables:" << std::endl
08866         << maximumOfOutputVariables << std::endl;
08867 
08868    // Write lower bound of output variables
08869 
08870    file << "LowerBoundOfOutputVariables:" << std::endl 
08871         << lowerBoundOfOutputVariables << std::endl;
08872 
08873    // Write upper bound of output variables
08874 
08875    file << "UpperBoundOfOutputVariables:" << std::endl
08876         << upperBoundOfOutputVariables << std::endl;
08877 
08878    // Write biases and synaptic weights
08879 
08880    Vector<double> neuralParameters =  getNeuralParameters();
08881 
08882    file << "NeuralParameters:" << std::endl
08883         << neuralParameters << std::endl;
08884 
08885    // Write number of independent parameters
08886 
08887    file << "NumberOfIndependentParameters:" << std::endl
08888         << numberOfIndependentParameters << std::endl;
08889 
08890    // Write name of independent parameters
08891 
08892    file << "NameOfIndependentParameters:" << std::endl
08893         << nameOfIndependentParameters << std::endl;
08894 
08895    // Write units of independent parameters
08896 
08897    file << "UnitsOfIndependentParameters:" << std::endl
08898         << unitsOfIndependentParameters << std::endl;
08899 
08900    // Write description of independent parameters
08901 
08902    file << "DescriptionOfIndependentParameters:" << std::endl
08903         << descriptionOfIndependentParameters << std::endl;
08904 
08905    // Write mean of independent parameters
08906 
08907    file << "MeanOfIndependentParameters:" << std::endl
08908         << meanOfIndependentParameters << std::endl;
08909 
08910    // Write standard deviation of independent parameters
08911 
08912    file << "StandardDeviationOfIndependentParameters:" << std::endl
08913         << standardDeviationOfIndependentParameters << std::endl;
08914 
08915    // Write minimum of independent parameters
08916 
08917    file << "MinimumOfIndependentParameters:" << std::endl
08918         << minimumOfIndependentParameters << std::endl;
08919 
08920    // Write maximum of independent parameters
08921 
08922    file << "MaximumOfIndependentParameters:" << std::endl
08923         << maximumOfIndependentParameters << std::endl;
08924 
08925    // Write lower bound of independent parameters
08926 
08927    file << "LowerBoundOfIndependentParameters:" << std::endl
08928         << lowerBoundOfIndependentParameters << std::endl;
08929 
08930    // Write upper bound of independent parameters
08931 
08932    file << "UpperBoundOfIndependentParameters:" << std::endl
08933         << upperBoundOfIndependentParameters << std::endl;
08934 
08935    // Write independent parameters
08936 
08937    file << "IndependentParameters:" << std::endl
08938         << independentParameters << std::endl;
08939 
08940    // Write pre and post processing method 
08941 
08942    file << "PreAndPostProcessingMethod:" << std::endl;
08943 
08944    switch(preAndPostProcessingMethod)   
08945    {
08946       case None:
08947       {
08948          file << "None" << std::endl;
08949       }
08950       break;
08951 
08952       case MeanAndStandardDeviation:
08953       {
08954          file << "MeanAndStandardDeviation" << std::endl;
08955       }
08956       break;
08957 
08958       case MinimumAndMaximum:
08959       {
08960          file << "MinimumAndMaximum" << std::endl;
08961       }
08962       break;
08963 
08964       default:
08965       {
08966          std::cerr << std::endl 
08967                    << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
08968                    << "void save(char*) method." << std::endl
08969                                    << "Unknown pre and postprocesing method: " << preAndPostProcessingMethod << "." << std::endl
08970                    << std::endl;
08971  
08972          exit(1);
08973       }
08974       break;
08975 
08976    }// end switch
08977 
08978    // Write numerical differentiation method 
08979 
08980    file << "NumericalDifferentiationMethod:" << std::endl;
08981 
08982    switch(numericalDifferentiationMethod)   
08983    {
08984       case ForwardDifferences:
08985       {
08986          file << "ForwardDifferences" << std::endl;
08987       }
08988       break;
08989 
08990       case CentralDifferences:
08991       {
08992          file << "CentralDifferences" << std::endl;
08993       }
08994       break;
08995 
08996       default:
08997       {
08998          std::cerr << std::endl 
08999                    << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
09000                    << "void save(char*) method." << std::endl
09001                    << "Unknown numerical differentiation method." << std::endl
09002                    << std::endl;
09003  
09004          exit(1);
09005       }
09006       break;
09007 
09008    }
09009 
09010    // Write display out of range warning
09011 
09012    file << "DisplayOutOfRangeWarning:" << std::endl
09013         << displayOutOfRangeWarning << std::endl;
09014 
09015    // Write display
09016 
09017    file << "Display:" << std::endl
09018         << display << std::endl;
09019 
09020    // Write numerical epsilon
09021 
09022    file << "NumericalEpsilon:" << std::endl
09023         << numericalEpsilon << std::endl;
09024 
09025    // Close file
09026 
09027    file.close();
09028 }
09029 
09030 
09031 // void load(char*) method
09032 
09080 
09081 void MultilayerPerceptron::load(char* filename)
09082 {
09083 
09084    std::fstream file;
09085 
09086    file.open(filename, std::ios::in);
09087 
09088    if(!file.is_open())
09089    {
09090       std::cerr << std::endl
09091                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
09092                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
09093                 << "Cannot open multilayer perceptron data file." << std::endl
09094                 << std::endl;
09095 
09096       exit(1);
09097    }
09098    else
09099    {
09100       if(display)
09101       {
09102          std::cout << std::endl
09103                    << "Loading multilayer perceptron from data file..." << std::endl;
09104       }
09105    }
09106 
09107    std::string word;
09108 
09109    // Number of inputs
09110 
09111    while(word != "NumberOfInputs:")
09112    {
09113       file >> word;
09114    }
09115 
09116    file >> numberOfInputs;
09117 
09118    // Number of hidden layers 
09119 
09120    file >> word;
09121 
09122    int numberOfHiddenLayers;
09123 
09124    file >> numberOfHiddenLayers;
09125 
09126    numbersOfHiddenNeurons.resize(numberOfHiddenLayers);
09127 
09128    // Numbers of hidden neurons
09129 
09130    file >> word;
09131 
09132    file >> numbersOfHiddenNeurons;
09133 
09134    // Number of outputs 
09135 
09136    file >> word;
09137 
09138    file >> numberOfOutputs;
09139 
09140    // Set architecture
09141 
09142    setNetworkArchitecture(numberOfInputs, numbersOfHiddenNeurons, numberOfOutputs);
09143 
09144    // Hidden layers activation function
09145 
09146    file >> word;
09147  
09148    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfHiddenLayers; i++)
09149    {
09150       file >> word;
09151 
09152       if(word == "Logistic")
09153       {
09154          hiddenLayersActivationFunction[i] = Perceptron::Logistic;
09155       }
09156       else if(word == "HyperbolicTangent")
09157       {
09158          hiddenLayersActivationFunction[i] = Perceptron::HyperbolicTangent;
09159       }
09160       else if(word == "Linear")
09161       {
09162          hiddenLayersActivationFunction[i] = Perceptron::Linear;
09163       }
09164       else
09165       {
09166          std::cerr << std::endl
09167                    << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
09168                    << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
09169                    << "Unknown file format. " << word << "???" <<std::endl
09170                    << std::endl;
09171    
09172          exit(1);   
09173       }
09174    }   
09175     
09176    setHiddenLayersActivationFunction(hiddenLayersActivationFunction);
09177 
09178    // Output layer activation function
09179 
09180    file >> word;
09181 
09182    file >> word;
09183 
09184    if(word == "Logistic")
09185    {
09186       outputLayerActivationFunction = Perceptron::Logistic;
09187    }
09188    else if(word == "HyperbolicTangent")
09189    {
09190       outputLayerActivationFunction = Perceptron::HyperbolicTangent;
09191    }
09192    else if(word == "Linear")
09193    {
09194       outputLayerActivationFunction = Perceptron::Linear;
09195    }
09196    else
09197    {
09198       std::cerr << std::endl
09199                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
09200                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
09201                 << "Unknown file format. " << word << "???" <<std::endl
09202                 << std::endl;
09203 
09204       exit(1);   
09205    }
09206 
09207    setOutputLayerActivationFunction(outputLayerActivationFunction);
09208 
09209    // Name of input variables
09210 
09211    file >> word;
09212 
09213    file >> nameOfInputVariables;
09214 
09215    // Name of output variables
09216 
09217    file >> word;
09218 
09219    file >> nameOfOutputVariables;
09220 
09221    // Units of input variables
09222 
09223    file >> word;
09224 
09225    file >> unitsOfInputVariables;
09226 
09227    // Units of output variables
09228 
09229    file >> word;
09230 
09231    file >> unitsOfOutputVariables;
09232 
09233    // Description of input variables
09234 
09235    file >> word;
09236 
09237    file >> descriptionOfInputVariables;
09238 
09239    // Description of output variables
09240 
09241    file >> word;
09242 
09243    file >> descriptionOfOutputVariables;
09244 
09245    // Mean of input variables
09246 
09247    file >> word;
09248 
09249    file >> meanOfInputVariables;
09250 
09251    // Standard deviation of input variables
09252 
09253    file >> word;
09254 
09255    file >> standardDeviationOfInputVariables;
09256 
09257    // Mean of output variables
09258 
09259    file >> word;
09260 
09261    file >> meanOfOutputVariables;
09262 
09263    // Standard deviation of output variables
09264 
09265    file >> word;
09266 
09267    file >> standardDeviationOfOutputVariables;
09268 
09269    // Minimum of input variables
09270 
09271    file >> word;
09272 
09273    file >> minimumOfInputVariables;
09274 
09275     // Maximum of input variables
09276 
09277    file >> word;
09278 
09279    file >> maximumOfInputVariables;
09280 
09281    // Minimum of output variables
09282 
09283    file >> word;
09284 
09285    file >> minimumOfOutputVariables;
09286 
09287     // Maximum of output variables
09288 
09289    file >> word;
09290 
09291    file >> maximumOfOutputVariables;
09292 
09293    // Lower bound of output variables
09294 
09295    file >> word;
09296 
09297    file >> lowerBoundOfOutputVariables;
09298 
09299     // Upper bound of output variables
09300 
09301    file >> word;
09302 
09303    file >> upperBoundOfOutputVariables;
09304 
09305    // Neural parameters
09306 
09307    file >> word;
09308 
09309    int numberOfNeuralParameters = getNumberOfNeuralParameters();
09310 
09311    Vector<double> neuralParameters(numberOfNeuralParameters);
09312 
09313    file >> neuralParameters;
09314 
09315    setNeuralParameters(neuralParameters);
09316 
09317    // Number of independent parameters
09318 
09319    file >> word;
09320    
09321    file >> numberOfIndependentParameters;
09322 
09323    // Set number of independent parameters
09324    
09325    setNumberOfIndependentParameters(numberOfIndependentParameters);
09326 
09327    // Name of independent parameters
09328 
09329    file >> word; 
09330 
09331    file >> nameOfIndependentParameters;
09332 
09333    // Units of independent parameters
09334 
09335    file >> word; 
09336 
09337    file >> unitsOfIndependentParameters;
09338 
09339    // Description of independent parameters
09340 
09341    file >> word; 
09342 
09343    file >> descriptionOfIndependentParameters;
09344 
09345    // Mean of independent parameters
09346 
09347    file >> word; 
09348 
09349    file >> meanOfIndependentParameters;
09350 
09351    // Standard deviation of independent parameters
09352 
09353    file >> word; 
09354 
09355    file >> standardDeviationOfIndependentParameters;
09356 
09357    // Minimum of independent parameters
09358 
09359    file >> word; 
09360 
09361    file >> minimumOfIndependentParameters;
09362 
09363    // Maximum of independent parameters
09364 
09365    file >> word; 
09366 
09367    file >> maximumOfIndependentParameters;
09368 
09369    // Lower bound of independent parameters
09370 
09371    file >> word; 
09372 
09373    file >> lowerBoundOfIndependentParameters;
09374 
09375    // Upper bound of independent parameters
09376 
09377    file >> word; 
09378 
09379    file >> upperBoundOfIndependentParameters;
09380 
09381    // Independent parameters
09382 
09383    file >> word; 
09384 
09385    file >> independentParameters;
09386 
09387    // Pre and postprocessing method
09388 
09389    file >> word;
09390 
09391    file >> word;
09392 
09393    if(word == "None")
09394    {
09395       preAndPostProcessingMethod = None;
09396    }
09397    else if(word == "MeanAndStandardDeviation")
09398    {
09399       preAndPostProcessingMethod = MeanAndStandardDeviation;
09400    }
09401    else if(word == "MinimumAndMaximum")
09402    {
09403       preAndPostProcessingMethod = MinimumAndMaximum;
09404    }
09405    else
09406    {
09407       std::cerr << std::endl
09408                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
09409                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
09410                 << "Unknown file format. " << word << "???" <<std::endl
09411                 << std::endl;
09412 
09413       exit(1);   
09414    }
09415 
09416    // Numerical differentiation method
09417 
09418    file >> word;
09419 
09420    file >> word;
09421 
09422    if(word == "ForwardDifferences")
09423    {
09424       numericalDifferentiationMethod = ForwardDifferences;
09425    }
09426    else if(word == "CentralDifferences")
09427    {
09428       numericalDifferentiationMethod = CentralDifferences;
09429    }
09430    else
09431    {
09432       std::cerr << std::endl
09433                 << "Flood Error: MultilayerPerceptron class." << std::endl
09434                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
09435                 << "Unknown file format. " << word << "???" <<std::endl
09436                 << std::endl;
09437 
09438       exit(1);   
09439    }
09440 
09441    // Display out of range warning
09442 
09443    file >> word;
09444    
09445    file >> displayOutOfRangeWarning;
09446 
09447    // Display
09448 
09449    file >> word;
09450    
09451    file >> display;
09452 
09453    // Numerical epsilon
09454 
09455    file >> word;
09456    
09457    file >> numericalEpsilon;
09458 
09459    // Close file
09460 
09461    file.close();
09462 }
